description: Before downloading the app make sure you can see Farsi letters on your mobile phone or tablet. Can you see the Farsi letters in the next line below? فارسی صفحه کلید If you see boxes instead of Farsi letters, your device does not support Farsi display. Enable Farsi Keyboard The steps may be slightly different from device to device. This instruction is for Samsung Galaxy S3. Launch Settings Go to My device (figure 4) Then tap the Language and Input option (figure 4) You will see the Farsi Keyboard (figure 5) Check the box (figure 5) Using Farsi Keyboard Start your favorite app(browser, Facebook, messaging, contact, ...) (figure 6) When you start typing, you will see a keyboard icon on the notification bar on top. (figure 6) Open the notification window and tap Select input method (figure 7) Then you can switch between Farsi and English (figure 7) When you pick Farsi Keyboard, you will see the keyboard (figure 8) Typing Farsi Letters Figure 1 show the Farsi letters. Tab the up arrow on the left to see Figure 2 For Figure 3, tab the key at the bottom left corner You can type English by pressing the letter A on Figure 1 To type connected form of a letter, press the up arrow and click the empty key(ZWJ) to the right of the space key (typing م followed by the ZWJ yields م‍) To type two letters unconnected, press the up arrow and click the empty key(ZWNJ) to the left of the space key is (typing م followed by the ZWNJ followed by م yields م‌م) You can use this Farsi Keyboard on any app just like you use the standard keyboard.

The app Food Intolerances is a tool to help everyone who has to stick to a restricted diet because of food intolerances or irritable bowel syndrome (IBS). Typical applications are: histamine intolerance, mastocytosis, fructose malabsorption, sorbitol intolerance, aspirin intolerance, a low fodmap diet, gluten sensitivity, or lactose intolerance. It contains about 700 foods that are commented and rated in view of the following subjects: ✔ Carbohydrate malabsorptions • Fructose malabsorption • Fructose/glucose ratio • Content of sugar (sucrose) • Sorbitol and other sugar alcohols • Lactose intolerance • Problematic fibers (e.g. fructans, galactans) • Comments and rating of tolerance ✔ Histamine intolerance / Mastocytosis • Histamine content of foods • Biogenic amines (e.g. tyramine) • Histamine liberators and DAO inhibitors • Problematic drugs • Food additives • Comments and rating of tolerance ✔ Aspirin/Salicylate intolerance • Salicylate content • Problematic food additives • Comments and rating of tolerance ✔ Other intolerances and allergies • Indication whether a food contains gluten* • Comments and rating for gluten intolerance* ✔ More features • Possibility to add own comments, e.g. to document individual allergies • Adjustment of the rating of foods • No internet connection required • Direct link to Wikipedia articles for all products • Uncheck unnecessary infos • Thumbnails for most foods * This app doesn’t rate the products of individual manufactures but products and products categories. It offers you all the information you need to deal with your intolerance and avoid common mistakes. +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ The app does not replace medical care and should not be used for diagnostic purposes. While the information provided here has been compiled to the best knowledge of the author, mistakes happen, since it is a complex matter, which depends closely on the individual person. We are constantly working to improve the app, but information may be wrong and may even contain harmful recommendations. The Baliza GmbH disclaims any liability as a developer of this app for the accuracy, completeness and timeliness of the information and any resulting damages, consequential damages and other disadvantages. The assertion of claims of any kind is excluded.
release_text: - We updated the topic Histamine Intolerance with more in-depth comments - You can now add your own notes and change your individual rating for every food - Improved search function now includes comments, medications and food additives - New layout has brighter colors and bigger thumbnails - We fixed the crashes in ASA intolerance We hope you like the improvements and are looking forward to hearing from you. If you have a moment, please, leave us a review! That really keeps us motivated!

description: Mahjong 2 Solitaire Jogatina is the top choice among fans of this age old game. It is the perfect companion for those who only have a few minutes to spend or hours. The simple rules and engaging game play has made Mahjong 2 Solitaire become one of the most popular casual games in the world. Whether you want to relax or do some brain and visual training this is the right choice of Mahjong 2 for you. And more: this is a FREE Mahjong game! Features: * 500 puzzles and growing on every new edition * Specially designed for Android * Beautiful backgrounds to choose from * Unique tile sets! * Relaxing game play * Hints, highlights and undo options * Optimized for Retina Devices! * Complete challenging goals and get up to three stars per solved board! * Three difficulty levels: Easy, Medium and Hard * And more! Playing Mahjong 2 Solitaire is as easy as it seems! Find and match pairs of identical tiles. When you get all tiles matched you complete the board. The game is also called Mahjongg Trails, Chinese Mahjong, Majong, Mah-jong, Kyodai, Majiang, Mah jongg and is the worldwide top played classical mahjong. Have much fun and as a side benefit you will develop your spacial reasoning, logical resources, visual memory and thinking agility. Enjoy this millennial oriental pastime.
release_text: In this version of the game Mahjong 2 Jogatina: - Improvements to the app’s performance. - and bug fixes. What do you think? Let us know at mahjong2.android@gazeus.com If you liked this update, rate the app Mahjong 2! Have a good game!

description: Learning to ★★★spell in Russian★★★ has never been so much fun with the new Smart Speller Russian from EduKidsApps! Entertaining way to learn alphabet, develop basic spelling skills and become a master of pronunciation: your child will hear the SOUND EACH LETTER MAKES (not the name of the letter in alphabet), and the proper pronunciation of the words. Please note: this is a lite version of the game: with one category open to try it out before buying the full version through in-app purchase. ★★★First words★★★ With its 80 original pictures across 7 categories (numbers and colours, fruit & veg, vehicles, farm animals, shapes, body parts), the game is played by tapping a moving object and then completing a word puzzle. The word selection features basic and most common words from each category, thus enriching the child’s vocabulary. ★★★Storyline★★★ To grasp and hold the child’s attention, the game has an interesting story that kids will love. Your children will be amazed by their quest to return seven colours of the rainbow to the sun by completing word puzzles correctly. ★★★Alphabet practice★★★ What makes it even more fun and educational is the app’s audio feature - every time you press any of the letters to complete a puzzle, that letter is pronounced. This way, apart from learning to spell, the child also learn to pronounce letters of the alphabet correctly. ★★★Word pronunciation★★★ Each time a kid taps on a picture of an object, it’s name is pronounced. This can work as a hint for medium and difficult complexity levels. After a puzzle is completed, the word is pronounced. This means that not only visual skills are involved, but rather an interaction of visual and auditory skills takes place. ★★★Skill development★★★ This game helps kids to develop a whole range of skills: motor skills and hand-eye coordination, visual and auditory skills, language and pronunciation skills, problem solving skills. This simple to use and effective interactive learning game was created by parents for parents to help their children learn to correctly pronounce and spell words and letters. Thanks to its three levels of complexity (with hints, without hints and with extra letters), Smart Speller will be exciting for kids to complete over and over again, moving to the next level as they grow up and learn.

description: The fun way to control your Philips Hue bulbs. Use voice commands and hue will be kind enough to talk back to you. Many configurable commands for changing your bulbs colours or simply say any sentence with any of the main colours in it. e.g. "Please change my bulbs to green red and blue, thanks". NEW! You can now create/delete light groups to easily select which lights you control. Also added manual control for when the novelty of the voice control gimmick wears thin. And of course plenty of funnies to be discovered. Ask hue any random question and discover the secrets of the universe hidden in her replies. Requires the Philips Hue Personal Wireless System. Developed using the Philips Hue Java SDK. Note: If the default language on your phone is not English some voice commands may not be recognized.

Movreak has been a *great* social app around movies and cinemas. It finally came to Android. Let's swipe the side menu, and you'll find these awesome features: • Now Playing It presents the movies currently playing in cinema everywhere. Beside in thumbnails, Movreak can present the movie posters in “cover” mode. Movreak also lets you informed which movies are just released in cinema with the “New” badge. Touch a movie poster, you’ll taste the new Show Time (for supported countries). Currently, show time is only available for Indonesia (for both 21 Cineplex and Blitzmegaplex). In this page, you’ll find almost about everything you can do with show time: share show time to Facebook and Twitter, or organise a watching plan to watch movie together with friends. For supported cinema (only for Indonesia’s Blitzmegaplex for now), you can check the seat availability in cinema. Touch “View Detail” button and you’ll find a whole lot more about the movie. • Movie Details You’ll find everything-need-to-know about a movie here. Rating, genre, cast and crew, duration, release date, synopsis, you name it. Not satisfied? Just tap IMDB button to find a whole lot more about the movie. While you’re in this page, let’s taste the “live” poster. • Search Movie You can search any movies here, literally any movies you can think of, in cinemas or not. Want to search the first “TRON” (1982)? You’ll find it, along with its details, posters, and even trailers. After search movie, what you can do next? Adding it to your Watching Plan. • Watching Plan & Watched Movies Watching movies is better together with friends. Playing in cinema or not, or even upcoming movie, you can invite your friends to watch it together. If you are a movie freak enough, you can use Watching Plan to organize all movies you’ll watch in the weekend or spare time. Just watched a movie? Mark it as “watched” and it will be automatically organized in your “Watched Movies” list. Hey, don’t forget to review the movie you just watched in “User Review”. • User Reviews We put a lot more ingredients in the new User Reviews. Just watch a movie and love it or hate it, why don't leave a review. Want to discuss a movie or not agree with someone's review? Just respond it. Keep the conversation going in the new User Reviews detail page. Like a review or want to report it as spoiler instead? tap “+” button and you’ll find all you can do with a review. As you can search any movies in Movreak, now you can review any movies as well. Want to see reviews of currently playing movies only? Use the filter. Tapping User Review’s title will present you options to filter the reviews. • Sign in To experience all features, you should sign-in to Movreak with existing Facebook or Twitter account. **Hint: signing-in with Facebook will unlock more features. • Notification Your review get liked or replied, or you’re invited to watch a movie by your friend, you’ll get notified with the push notification. -- Currently, show time and cinema data are only available for Indonesia. But it doesn’t mean you can’t use Movreak outside that country. You can use all features beside show time and check seats.
release_text: v1.8.7 Happy new year 2016! v1.8.6 Happy Holiday everyone :) v1.8.5 General improvement & bug fixing. v1.8.4 - Awaken the Movie Freak within. We are updating our app icon to Kylo Ren :). - Minor bug fixing and general improvement. v1.8.3 - Minor bug fixing in news and widget v.1.7.8 We are back with some improvement such as: - Fix check seat - Fix crash at News page - Auto refresh Now Playing Widget - Now you can open detail movie from Widget

HDR Fx Photo Editor gives you the best and most vibrant HDR effect on android, and this is all accomplished from just a single photo. Use sliders to get the very same HDR look you had admired on many photographic sites. Result will be similar to professional HDR camera photographs. Other than HDR effects, you can apply curve adjustments to your photos. With HDR Fx Photo Editor curve adjustment is now under your fingers. You can do curve adjustments on red green and blue channels you can apply it directly to the rgb (composite) channel. HDR Fx Photo Editor also provide another important photo edit tool called Levels. Achieve professional results with adjusting black and white tone adjustment or applying gamma correction with a single touch. HDR Fx Photo Editor comes with tens of different frame and border options. Crop your full resoution photos, with HDR Fx Photo Editor, you can now crop your photos with a single tap. If you don’t want full resolution photos you can resize photos. HDR Fx Photo Editor is the most comprehensive photo editor on android and it gives you the ability to do any photo task within a few taps. • Rgb, Red, green, blue channel curves. • 17 overlay and bokeh effects • Crop • 50 HDR effects • Composite, curve options • Gamma correction • Levels adjustment (black and white tonal) • Contrast, Brightness, Saturation, Tint, Opacity adjustment • Unsharp filter, sharpness control • Sharpen and blur • Dramatic black and white results • Put frames and border on photos. • Make photos dramatic with textures • Vignette filters • Rotate photos left and right. • Flip photos horizontal or vertical. • Straighten photos with Straighten tool • Share photos on Instagram, Twitter, Facebook. • Resize photos.

Simple Podcatcher is a basic yet elegant podcast app designed to manage your podcast content easily. Along with basic playback functionality, Simple Podcatcher features a sophisticated three-column layout . One contains the list of podcast subscriptions, another displays episodes currently available (for the selected subscription), and the third column clearly displays detailed podcast episode descriptions. This layout works especially well on tablets and big-screen phones. Multiple feeds are supported with this elegant design and can conveniently be searched while playing. The integrated podcast finder gets you going quickly. Simple Podcatcher is available at no cost and allows for unlimited streaming and downloading of podcast content. For playlists, filters, and many more premium features, check out Podcatcher Deluxe and Video Podcatcher Deluxe (both available on Google Play). See http://www.podcatcher-deluxe.com for links and more information.   Highlights → Adaptive layout, works great on both phones and tablets → Integrated podcast catalog → OPML file import and export → Works with Android Wear and Android Auto → Support for Bluetooth audio devices → Notification and lock screen integration → Synchronization via Dropbox and gpodder.net → No ads, no tracking
release_text: - Support Podlove Paged Feeds - Follow <itunes:new-feed-url> - More Android Auto and Android Wear work - Improve gpodder.net sync

description: Favorite food or a slender waistline: that’s really an eternal dilemma. To get rid of those inches, you need to exercise but the problem is that you hate running. And no wonder if you don’t know how to do it right. But once you do you’re gonna love it! And we’re going to teach you that. START RUNNING is a 4-week training program that will turn you from a Michelin Man into an untiring running machine in a month’s time. Well, all right, you won’t be ready for a marathon, but you’ll really be able to run AND you’ll be enjoying it! START RUNNING will put you on a schedule of 3 training sessions per week, each lasting about 30 minutes. An hour and a half of exercise a week is pretty manageable, even if you’re an extremely busy person. Besides, the workouts are so conveniently arranged that you’ll be looking forward to your next training session! The program is based on interval training, which is a combination of running, jogging, walking and resting, so you’ll develop a running body and improve your lung capacity quickly and comfortably. You’ll be amazed at the changes in your body and abilities after only 4 weeks! App Features: - Effective training plan from the best coaches - GPS map saved for each training session - Real-time stats of your pace, distance, time and other parameters - Audio cues during all workouts to keep you focused - Listening and managing your favorite music from the app - Motivating tips on running with each training session - Sharing achievements with Facebook & Twitter friends - Inspiring quotes keep you motivated while running - Synchronization of your stats & logs with an upgrade from the free version - Integration with Runkeeper, Fitbit, MapMyRun – your activities are automatically synchronized with these networks Get ready to be surprised if you think you would never be able to start running! Note: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life. This app is developed for informational purposes only. You must always consult your physician or doctor before starting any fitness program. Follow us! Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RedRockApps Twitter: @RedRockApps Instagram: @RedRockApps

Entdecke Castle Clash zusammen mit anderen Spielern auf der ganzen Welt! NEUE spannende und herausfordernde Spielmodi! Eines der am besten bewerteten Strategiespiele in Deutschland und vielen weiteren Ländern! 4.6+ Sterne Bewertung! Baue und erkämpfe dir deinen Weg zu Ruhm und Ehre in Castle Clash! Mit mehr als 100 Millionen Spielern weltweit, wird es dir im am süchtig machendsten Spiel aller Zeiten, nie langweilig werden! Castle Clash ist, mit seiner Mischung aus tempogeladener Strategie und aufregenden Schlachten, ein Spiel epischen Ausmaßes! Wirb eine Vielzahl mächtiger Helden an und führe diese, mit einer Armee aus mystischen Kreaturen in die Schlacht. Erbaue dein Reich nach deiner Vorstellung und Strategie. Kämpfe dich an die Spitze und werde der beste Castle Clash Spieler auf der Welt. Jetzt verfügbar in Französisch, Deutsch, Spanisch, Italienisch, Russisch, Chinesisch, Japanisch, Koreanisch, Thai und Indonesisch. Spielmerkmale: ✔ Heldenevolution - Betrete das Schlachtfeld mit noch cooleren und mächtigeren Helden als je zuvor. ✔ Hier kommt der Dämon! Kämpfe zusammen mit deinen Freunden, gegen eine völlig neue Bedrohung! ✔ Verteidigt eure Basen Seite an Seite in Co-Op Schlachten! ✔ Baue und verbessere deine uneinnehmbare Festung! ✔ Erstelle eine ultimative Armee aus Helden und mystischen Kreaturen! ✔ Temporeiche, spannende und strategische Schlachten! ✔ Messe dich in der Arena und lasse deine Helden gegen die anderer Spieler antreten! ✔ Gründe deine eigene Gilde und führe sie zum Sieg in den Gildenkriegen! ✔ Kämpfe zusammen mit anderen Spielern und bezwingt gemeinsam Team Dungeons! ✔ Entfessele mächtige Zauber durch simples Antippen des Bildschirms! ✔ Free-to-play Hinweis: Dieses Spiel benötigt eine aktive Internetverbindung. One of the top rated strategy games in Germany and many other countries! 4.6+ star rating! Build and fight your way to glory in Castle Clash! With more than 100 million players worldwide, it is you are bored in the most addictive game ever, never! Castle Clash is, with its blend of tempo charged Strategy and exciting battles, a game of epic proportions! Recruit a variety of powerful heroes and bring them with an army of mystical creatures into battle. Build your kingdom by your imagination and strategy. Fight your way to the top. And become the best player in the world Castle Clash Now available in French, German, Spanish, Italian, Russian, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Thai and Indonesian. Game Features: ✔ Heroes Evolution - Step into a battlefield with even cooler and more powerful heroes than ever. ✔ Here comes the demon! Fight together with your friends, against an entirely new threat! ✔ Defend your bases side by side in co-op battles! ✔ Build and upgrade your impregnable fortress! ✔ Create an ultimate army of heroes and mystical creatures! ✔ Fast-paced, exciting and strategic battles! ✔ show in the arena and let your heroes compete yourself against the other players! ✔ reasons your own guild and lead them to victory in the Guild Wars! ✔ fighting together with other players and defeat together Team Dungeons! ✔ Unleash powerful spells simply by touching the screen! ✔ Free-to-play Note: This game requires an active Internet connection. Visit our Facebook fan at: http://www.facebook.com/CastleClashDe

description: Once you pop, you can't stop! Pop Star is a very interesting game on iPhone and now it is migrated to Android. Tap on two or more adjacent stars to destroy them. _______________________________________ How to Play: - Just tap two or more blocks of the same color. - There is no time limit, but each stage has target points to proceed to next stage. _______________________________________ Tips on Scoring: - Remember just two rules below: 1. The more blocks you pop, the more score you will get 2. Try to clear all block, you will get a lot of bonus.

Start, locate and control your car from virtually anywhere with your Android phone or Android Wear device! “Making the cloud-connected car a reality” - Edmunds.com "Without a doubt, one of the coolest apps I've ever seen" - GIZMODO With the release of its all-new 4th generation Directed SmartStart app, connecting with and controlling your vehicle is easier than ever – including control via your Android Wear smart watch! - Add a SmartStart module to the Directed remote start or security system in your car so you can start, lock and unlock your car from virtually anywhere. - Add a SmartStart GPS module instead, and you can also locate your car, share activity on Facebook (because your car needs friends, too), and set safety notifications if your car is speeding or goes where it's not supposed to go. - For the ultimate connected car experience, install a complete Directed SmartStart Digital System and you’ll also get notified if your vehicle sets a diagnostic code, along with direct feedback from the car databus for feature status. Check out the 60 Day Free Trial GPS Premium service that’s included at no extra cost with these systems! - For even more convenience, add a Directed SmartKey module and your car will unlock when it detects you approaching, and lock again automatically when you walk away. - Directed SmartStart is designed for use with compatible remote start and security systems sold under the following brands: Astrostart, Automate, AutoStart, Avital, Clifford, and Python. Now you can securely remote start, lock/unlock, or find your car using your Android device, with the exciting new 4.0 SmartStart app. The sleek, modern dashboard of Directed SmartStart 4.0 gives you fingertip control over the following features of your installed remote start or security/remote start system: - Lock/arm - Unlock/disarm - Remote car starter - Trunk release - Panic - Aux channels Follow these three simple steps to get Directed SmartStart: 1) Download the free Directed SmartStart app 2) Get a SmartStart system installed in your vehicle 3) Set up your account, and start using your SmartStart system Directed SmartStart 4.0 also includes free Guest membership in Motor Club, providing convenient flat rate 24/7 access to our nationwide roadside assistance network. Just press a button in the app to get connected for towing due to breakdown or accidents, or assistance with a dead battery or flat tire. No hardware or service purchase required. New for Directed SmartStart 4.0 - Completely redesigned app with the controls you use most often right at your fingertips, and other useful features just a tap or swipe away - New swipe to start feature eliminates accidental remote start commands (modern dashboard) - User-selectable dashboard and home page settings – now you can customize the app for the way you use it - Map page now integrates GPS and SmartPark features seamlessly with quick access for programming location or movement alerts - One-touch vehicle selection menu with integrated vehicle status page - One-touch access to Alert history and new alert programming. - Built-in tutorial videos, help overlay on key pages, and guided on-boarding process make getting to know SmartStart 4.0 easier than ever. - Supports Directed SmartKey passive lock/unlock features - Set up your own SmartStart account right from the app including picking your own personalized password (now required for users that have Bluetooth-only Directed SmartKey or DSM50BT systems; optional for new SmartStart cellular system owners). - In-app management of your SmartStart vehicles and their associated service plans. - Start, lock or unlock your car using your Android Wear smart watch, or send other commands. - Receive alert notifications on your phone and Android Wear smart watch if vehicle alarm is triggered, or a SmartStart GPS alert is received (push notification support now included in app, server-side support will be added shortly)
release_text: Map page improvements Added native back button navigation Various bug & crash fixes

description: Foto Photo Wallpaper Live Wallpaper! Is an awesome live wallpaper for stylishly showing off your photos! Works for both your tablets and your handsets. Photos from your gallery are displayed on these live wallpapers and change according to your time settings. The Paid version allows you to download photos from flickr and facebook and display them along with photos from your gallery. Tired of the same old boring layouts from the other guys? Change it up! Foto Photo Wallpaper Free version gives you a taste of the many layouts we have. You'll always have a new way to show off your photos! Foto Photo Wallpaper also understands that handset carriers charge for data so we've included with the paid version the option to only download from flickr and facebook when you're on wifi. No need to worry about your data bills going through the roof just because you like to show off your photos in crisp resolutions. Free Version: - A Taste of the many Layouts. - A few of the Photos Transitions. - Adjust the time between photo changes. Pro Version: - Tons of Layouts! - Support getting photos from Facebook and Flickr! - Photos Transition with exciting effects! - Option to Download photos from internet only when on wifi! - Adjust the time between photo changes! - Stop Touches from Changing the images!
release_text: - 1 New Layout from the Pro version. - Added a launcher app icon to list of apps, in case people aren't sure how to set the wallpaper.

description: This app is a plug-in for applications called " METRO 24 ". It allow to read tickets of Moscow metro by using NFC in your phone. Read data: ✔ Number of remaining trips ✔ Ticket type ✔ Total number of trips ✔ Date of issuance and expiration date of the ticket ✔ Ticket number ✔ Last station name Also, has a widget. In addition, this plugin keeps statistics on each ticket, and can display a graphical diagram of tickets usage.

This App was created to help veterinary practitioners, veterinary students and vet technicians deal with exotic species most likely to present to a veterinary practice including pet birds (parrots), reptiles (snakes, lizards and turtles) and small mammals such as rabbits, ferrets, and rodents (chinchillas, guinea pigs, rats, hamsters, gerbils). This short but comprehensive guide not only covers husbandry, nutrition and handling, but also provides an overview of common diseases, treatments and formulary for each exotic pet specie presented. An image gallery is also available in order to get some visual idea of certain common conditions that you might encounter in your veterinary practice.

Join the world of Kick and Think in this puzzling letters game. The medieval world is full of untold stories, creatures and royalty, weaved in between the lines of reality and etching through history to be rewritten into legends! Battle your way to save the princess whilst you challenge evil minds that hold her friends in captivity. Play along and get your family to help you on your quest! Kick and Think is a classic, word arrangement game, with amusing levels and brain-bending words. Save creatures and other animals from witches schemes and evil scams! Then, battle your way to solve the word in the fastest time possible! The game is simple, tap objects around the scene to unlock letters! Remember, you’re against the clock so don’t waste time! Once you’ve collected all the letters, you must arrange them into the right place to create the codeword that sets the animal free or unlocks a door! Rescue the princess and her friends! This game tests your mind and spelling skills whilst being fun and puzzling! This is a great game for all ages, so what are you waiting for? Help to save the princess before it’s too late!

Black cat - an object of superstition different peoples. According to some superstitious, is a harbinger of misfortune. According to other superstitious, such as living in the house of a black cat brings good luck. Prejudice does not depend on the breed cats and concern only its color. But all agree that these animals - the most beautiful creatures! Set these black beauties on your phone!

This calendar will help you organize your appointments, birthdays, special days, Holidays, It will help you remember all important events you do not want to miss. For phone and tablet. Digital calendar 2015 - 2016 online. now you can manage your schedule. For reminders. Use this Application or Website to easily record your own medical records and your family's personal health information for free. NOTE: WE DO NOT GET YOUR MEDICAL RECORDS FROM YOUR PROVIDERS - YOU MUST ENTER THE DATA. * NEW * Emergency contacts + Blood Type. Also view your medical records offline - without an internet connection. Record your medical history at home and take your phone or tablet to the Doctor's office. Don't choose between a solution that requires you to back up your medical records from a device in case it is replaced or re-initialized, and a web-based solution that saves your data but is not always accessible due to having a poor signal or a requirement to put your device in "airplane mode" due to hospital regulations.  This app supports the best of both worlds, providing interactive access while connected to the web, and allows you to view the latest information from your medical records while offline. * NEW Pinch/Zoom, native time/date widgets (tap to show) Take responsibility for tracking your health records. With the Track My Medical Records app, you can store your medical records for all of your doctors along with your own notes in one place. You are not tied to one insurance provider to maintain your medical information or personal health history. Record the changes to your health records at the doctor's office - right there on the spot, in this app or on the web - while it's fresh in your mind. You'll be able to recall your medical records at any time and place. Of course you can always add it later via this app or the web. You record all the personal health information you see fit to maintain, using your own words, in an easy to use interface. Our built-in library of medications and conditions eases your data entry. We try to help auto-complete your doctor's name (and address, where needed) once you've entered it the first time. You'll never have to backup your data because all your personal health records (PHR) are safely stored in the cloud with redundant servers and continuous backups. You can also access your the medical records you created from any device including iPhones, tablets, etc. with a web browser. For desktops access visit http://www.trackmymedicalrecords.com . For mobile devices go to http://m.trackmymedicalrecords.com Since your personal health information contains sensitive data, we use only encrypted (SSL) connections to transfer that information to and from your device or computer. Additionally, your account information and patient information is encrypted in the database. This app does not require social security numbers, full names, or insurance information. With this app/site you'll be able to: 1. quickly provide a doctor or EMT a summary of medications, allergies and current conditions for yourself, a child, or an elderly parent (some even use this app for pets). 2. ** NEW ** quickly recall emergency contact information and blood type for each patient or child 3. easily recall when was the last time you or anyone in your family had a tetanus shot or other immunization 4. plot a growth chart and see how your child's height and weight compare to other children 5. Track the history of your Medications, Allergies, Conditions, Immunizations, Procedures, Appointments and more 6. Add and graph your own record of medical stats such as blood pressure (both systolic and diastolic on the same graph), blood sugar level, and any other stats you can think of. Email support@trackmymedicalrecords.com for help, problems, or suggestions. Also, check out the FAQ. ***NOTE*** we require that you to create an account in order to allow access from the web as well as from the app. You can select to use any email address and password, or use single sign-on with your Google ID (and then we don't see your password). If you uninstall, we'd appreciate knowing why, so we can improve the app. Tell us at support@trackmymedicalrecords.com

(Simon Says) + TIMED FARTS! + MOVEMENT DETECTION! + REPEAT option for TIMED and MOVEMENT modes! + 30 HIGH-QUALITY FART SOUNDS! + AWESOME GRAPHICS AND USER INTERFACE! Atomic Fart is the ultimate Fart Machine, Whoopie Cushion, Fart Timer, Motion Detection Fart, Fart Drumset AND Simon Farts all in one! And its FREE!!!!!! It is the ultimate fart arsenal in your pocket. With 30 super high quality crystal clear fart sounds, Atomic Fart is the most comprehensive and feature-packed fart machine in Google Play and any mobile device in the planet! Lots of toots is just the beginning! Switch to TIMED MODE and your device will rip one out as soon as the timer runs out. Set it to repeat and it will keep blasting each time it runs out. Turn on MOVEMENT DETECTION and your device will blast your pre-selected atomic blast as soon as it detects the slightest movement! Perfect for hiding it in the couch, chairs, purses, pockets or any place that will cause tons of laughs and/or embarrassment! description: Popular blog http://WellnessMama.com provides an updated health, wellness, recipe and DIY app for busy moms trying to provide their families the healthiest options possible in a hectic world. Find the latest healthy recipe ideas, weight loss and health tips, DIY beauty and cleaning recipes, natural and herbal remedy informaiton and green living ideas and more with one-touch access. Connect with Wellness Mama on Facebook, Twitter, Google+ or Pinterest, or send her pictures of your cooking creations through the app for inclusion in future blog posts. Updated app has increased functionality to help your family live a healthy lifestyle in the easiest way possible. Stay up to date on the latest Wellness Mama activity via the in-app Facebook, Twitter, & YouTube feeds. You can also submit your favorite health, wellness, and food photos for inclusion in a future Wellness Mama blog post.

A new otome game is out from our proud series “Shall we date?” with 3 million downloads worldwide: “Shall we date?: Scarlet Fate —Fragments of the past—”　. Scarlet fate —Fragments of the past—(original title Shirahana no Ori —Hiiro no Kakera 4) is one of the many successful games produced by the famous dating Sim game brand “Otomate” from Idea Factory. The Shall we date? Team is proud to announce the result of this new collaboration. “ Scarlet fate”, an original story featuring exquisite illustrations , is now available on mobile platform for the first time in English! 1.Story Introduction Set against the backdrop of the Heian period (ca. AD 1000) in Japan...In a sacred, snow-covered village is kept a sword with the power to bring the world to an end. One young maiden of a shrine is fated to seal the Sword’s power and protect it: Princess Tamayori. She has spent her days since childhood being tormented by her sins in loneliness and under the heavy burden of protecting the Sword so that its power would not be released. ...Until one night when she encounters a wounded god and her lonely life changes forever; she will face the end of the world with comrades willing to help her. She fights to prevent the demise risking her own life, but she begins to waver between her resolve and her wish to live for the one that she loves... Will there be a future for those who bear sins? In this snow-fluttering world, the tale of the ancient Princess Tamayori unfolds. 2.Characters Akifusa Oki : A serious officer who attends on Princess Tamayori “I want to be stronger to protect you.” Gentoka : A god who pledges his allegiance to Princess Tamayori “My life belongs to you. You can use it as you like, Princess Tamayori.” Kuso-no-mikoto : Princess Tamayori's fiance who is a sarcastic god “What a sassy girl! You don't deserve to be my wife.” Kodonomae : A god who excels in the art of war “Why don't you smile? Everyone likes your smile.” Furutsugu Akishino : A chief of security with an alluring air about him “Who can refuse a request from such a beautiful princess?” 3. In This App, You Can: 1)Enjoy spending time with good-looking characters with exceptional physical abilities involved in the story. 2)Enjoy multiple ending stories where every choice you make counts. 3)Collect around 40 photos per character by reading the whole story and all the endings. ©2014 IDEA FACTORY/DESIGN FACTORY ©2014 NTT Solmare Corp. Scarlet Fate, and its associated logos, characters names and distinctive likenesses are property of IDEA FACTORY/DESIGN FACTORY in the U.S.A. and other countries. Shall we date? and its logo are trademark of NTT Solmare Corp. All rights reserved.
release_text: [Upgrade Description for version 1.6.0] *User interface improvements *Minor bugs fixed. Thank you for playing "Shall we date?: Scarlet Fate"!

description: Summers is here, stay out of the heat by getting into a BIG Transport Truck, and do what you do best. TRANSPORT! Hey all Drivers and Transporters ! Get inside your mega big truck and buckle up for a heavy duty and crazy challenge. Drive these huge cargo Transporter Trucks, which are fully loaded with goods, as carefully as you can. Transporter Trucker 3D Simulator brings you a crazy combination of precision driving and cargo load management. Drive carefully as making sharp turns can make the product fall out of the trailer. This is a test of your driving and parking abilities that will be fun and quite challenging. Transport cargo to the destination in the city and park at the indicated spot. With easy controls and flexible camera angles, maneuver your truck accordingly on the streets and transport the goods before time runs out. How well can you manage the load while you drive these massive trucks? It’s a crazy challenge of precision driving where you have to make sure the goods stay in place due to the jerks and sharp breaks. Transporter Trucker 3D features: • 3 Super mega transporter truckers for you to drive • 30 Fun and challenging trucking missions for you to enjoy • Totally FREE and smooth gameplay • Impeccable 3D graphics and city environments Let’s drive these Transport Truckers and see who is best at managing the cargo load and careful driving. Guys show your support by leaving a positive review. Don't forget to like us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/Tapinator

12 of the most popular "patience" solitaire card games in 1 pack. Includes Klondike, Pyramid, Spider, Clock, Yukon, Canfield, Four Seasons, Sultan's Harem, Idiot's Delight, Golf, Calculation, and Freecell. Each game has custom gameplay options which allow you to play using your favorite solitaire variation on the standard rules. Personalize your game with a choice of card fronts, decorative card backs, and beautiful game backgrounds. Astraware Solitaire also includes the fun Golden Trophy Deck awards system - get all 52 awards to collect the Golden Deck and unlock it to play with! ***If you have updated from the old version you can change your settings by selecting the game you want to play, tap on the Settings icon and change the rules to play the way you like! To change card backs and backgrounds use Settings on the main menu!*** ***Droid device users please note! To play in landscape, launch the game in landscape. To play in portrait, launch in portrait. You need to exit the game fully (press the back hard key when on the game Home screen) to allow this to work. This is due to a crash issue on Droid, Droid 2, Droid X etc.***

Family Locator by Life360 is the most accurate family locator on the market. Family Locator simplifies life in the digital world by making it easy to stay connected to the people who matter most. With Life360 you can: • Create your own groups, called “Circles,” of loved ones, friends, teammates -- whoever matters most and chat with them in Family Locator for FREE. • View the real-time location of Circle Members on a private family map that’s only visible on Family Locator • Receive real-time alerts when Circle Members arrive at or leave destinations (Eliminate disruptive “Where are you?” texts) • Track stolen phones or lost phones • Enjoy a more diverse array of features and benefits than those found on T-Mobile Familywhere, Sprint Family Locator, Verizon Family Locator or AT&T Familymap. • Use Family Tracker’s state-of-the-art GPS tracking technology for directions to favorite locations from wherever you are. Family Tracker Offers Real Time Location Data “I would recommend this App to anybody…Thanks for the personal touch, it makes me feel more comfortable in this day and age.” – Family Locator User Scott Tatum. Plan your next family gathering with family tracker and end multiple texts to learn everyone’s estimated arrival time. Family tracker alerts you when family members have checked in at a location and thanks to GPS Tracking technology, family tracker can also advise if someone is running late. GPS Tracking of All Circle Members For time-sensitive communication, Family Locator can quickly pinpoint the location of every family member. GPS Tracking for non-smartphone users is also possible, for a small monthly fee. This knowledge is quite handy for party planning: use GPS Tracking to make sure all guests have arrived before the guest of honor shows up! Family Loctor also saves your most commonly visited locations and can provide directions to them quickly (thank you Family Locator!). The best GPS Tracking App This handy, easy-to-use app leverages the latest technology to help you stay connected in real time to the people (and the devices) that matter most. Life360’s Family Locator GPS Tracking functions, features and benefits include: GPS Tracking to find Friends and Family. Life360 GPS tracking app uses GPS coordinates and state-of-the-art GPS location data to report the real-time whereabouts of your friends and family. Simply install the Life360 Family Locator app on your phone and your families’ phones. Once registered, each member appears as a unique icon on the GPS tracking navigational map so you’ll know exactly where each family members is, at all times. No need to send annoying “Where are your?” or “What’s your ETA?” texts, the Life360 Family Locator puts this information at your fingertips. And to make life super easy, we send you GPS tracking alerts the moment your friends arrive at the appointed location! Reliable Cell Phone Tracker The Life360 family Locator is a very reliable Cell Phone Tracker. It can pinpoint the location of registered mobile devices, smart phones and even old school feature phones via the app’s website, 24/7. Our GPS Phone Tracker lets you locate Android Phones, iPhones and Windows Phones. Its easy to use. All you have to do is invite your family members or friends and you can start tracking them on your Phone to track any cell phone. Phone Tracking for Family Members With Feature Phones Family members who don’t have the latest smart phone (or a smart phone at all), can still enjoy our GPS tracking features and benefits. Here’s how it works: The app will send a text invite to the feature phone. Once your family member accepts the invitation and replies with a “yes,” to the text, their individual icon will appear on the app’s GPS maps. If their phone is lost, the app will provide GPS navigation assistance to help you guide them its destination. It’s a phone tracker extraordinaire. To track a feature phone you will require a premium membership.

description: If you like pairs or memory-games, you will love this one. Falling cards coming in waves, or cards sliding over chutes. Find the pairs before they touch the ground! Up to four players on the same device. Special mode for one player. Collect the pairs with as less mistakes as possible to earn highscore or solve waves of cards. Four game modes: Static, Stack, Waves and Chute Wave: The cards are falling down. Can you clear the cards fast enough before they touch the ground? Chute: The cards slide down criss-cross over chutes. Remove all before they reach the ground. Stack: The cards are stacked. Remove one from a stack and the ones upon will fall down. Different decks: Flowers, Colors, Animals and Math. Play combos for bonus points and joker. Three difficulties. Train your short term memory while having fun! The full version contains the gamemode chute and two additional difficulties to play faster and with more (up to 42) cards.

One of the biggest and greatest adventure game in the Google Play. Embark yourself on the wondrous journey throughout the amazing world inside the rabbit hole. Set in a world full of wonders, quirks and things from beyond our reality, Violett is a remarkable adventure game that will push your brain to the limits and engross you completely. Dragged by her parents, a young and rebellious teenage girl – Violett, moves to an old spooky house in the middle of nowhere. Forced away from her friends and life in the city; she imagines how boring life in countryside will be: spending day after day, bored in her room with absolutely nothing to do. But what she cannot imagine, is that in just few moments, she'll have the adventure of her life. A spark of light from the nearby mouse hole catches her attention, she reaches inside and in a blink of an eye she's in a completely different place. So familiar, yet so distant. So magnificent, and yet dangerous. A place where frogs singing operas are daily occurrence, garden gnomes are emissaries from another dimension and power of telekinesis is not freaking anyone out. Now only your wit and luck can help her unite with her parents. Rack your brain on intricate puzzles that will allow you to move forward. Use the power of telekinesis to get you out of your troubles. Fight the evil spider queen that wants to make you her new trophy. Use your touch to roam the beautiful and psychedelic world, inspired by Alice in Wonderland, Dali and other great works. Immerse yourself in the soothing sound track - Fantastic 2,5D point-and-click adventure game - Unique world inside the 'rabbit-hole' - Immersive mode support - Multitude of puzzles and riddles - A spooky atmosphere of mystery and uneasiness - Evil Spider Queen who's trying to prevent you from ever coming back - Paranormal forces to manipulate objects - Beautiful hand-painted graphics full of quirkiness and style - Full parallel reality inspired by Alice in the Wonderland and other great works

description: The game design is pretty simple yet very powerful. You play on 9 tic-tac-toe fields which form a big tic-tac-toe. The official rules can be found on http://mathwithbaddrawings.com/2013/06/16/ultimate-tic-tac-toe/ where the only twist is, that within our version a small tic-tac-toe is considered as “full” if somebody won the tic-tac-toe. This version of the game is a quick and rough version of a multiplayer (and Computer-Opponent) game. Please be patient while loading (give it maybe 15-20 seconds). It looks like nothing happens at the beginning; instead your opponent is eventually playing. We did not spend a lot of time for Design and Artwork, instead we were looking to have something stable and nice to play with… Checkout also our official developer website, there we explain everything a little bit better, the space here is just not sufficient enough ( http://expertino.com/tictactoe ) Also try the other ultimate tic tac toe versions, we saw that some of them have a better design, but lack in the multiplayer ability or don’t have computer opponents…

How to study effectively? Want to master Swedish vocabulary? Swedish flashcards are images/text/sound on cards, used to help remember new vocabulary in Swedish. Instead of simply reading the definition in a dictionary, the brain is also challenged via our several learning modes: Study, Slide show, Matching, Memorize, Quiz, Spelling , Re-arrange to make the learning Swedish language more exciting and fun. ♥ ♥ GREAT CONTENT ♥ ♥ Swedish flashcards app includes 4000+ premade Swedish flashcards which cover the most used Swedish words from 9 categories: •Calendar •Description •Hobbies •Food and Meals •Human •Nature •Objects •Society •Travel Basic features: • Import cardsets from Couser hero, Quizlet, Flashcard exchange. • Track study progress using Leitner system. • Display statistics for cards and games • Search cardsets from our database with millions of flashcards on various subjects. • Review schedule to help you review flashcards before they are expired. • Customize flashcards by selecting font, background and languages. • Access flashcards created from http://www.superflashcard.com Premium features: • Text to speech to study flashcards without looking at screens. • Download unlimited flashcards to your devices for offline study • Customize text color and background color/images of cards This app is also available on Apple App Store, Amazon Kindle App Store, Blackberry App Store and Windows Phone App Store. Please visit us at http://about.superflashcard.com/tour/ for more information .

FASTUNE! is a brand new mobile guitar tuner that will help you get your axe in gear quickly and accurately. FASTUNE! is the only POLYPHONIC tuner available for Android devices. Muzei is a live wallpaper that gently refreshes your home screen each day with famous works of art. It also recedes into the background, blurring and dimming artwork to keep your icons and widgets in the spotlight. Simply double touch the wallpaper or open the Muzei app to enjoy and explore the artwork in its full glory. Alternatively, you can choose your favorite photos from your own gallery or other apps to use on your home screen. To keep your wallpaper fresh, Muzei will rotate through your favorite photos every few hours. Finally, Muzei is developer-friendly. All the code is available at http://code.muzei.co and Muzei even offers a simple API that allows you to build your own wallpaper source. For API details, visit http://api.muzei.co . ····· Muzei now includes a watch face for Android Wear, so you can see your latest wallpaper right on your wrist! ····· Made in New York by Roman Nurik. Muzei is a transliteration of the Russian word музей, which means “museum.” Featured artwork in Muzei is curated daily by our small staff and made possible thanks to WikiArt.org and its contributors. Many thanks to Ian Lake for the watch face, and the many other contributors that help make Muzei possible.

description: Churrasco Esse índice serve para você que quer fazer um churrasco. Será que o tempo vai estar bom ou não para assar aquela carninha? Se o tempo não está favorável, a opção é procurar um lugar coberto para fazer o churrasco ou procurar uma churrascaria! Artrite Com o intuito de colaborar com o bem estar da população a Somar desenvolveu o índice de artrite. Quando o tempo pode influenciar em sua saúde? A baixa temperatura, alto grau de umidade e pressão atmosférica influenciam na dor reumática em diferentes maneiras, mas depende muito da sensibilidade de cada pessoa. Com algumas ferramentas alertamos se o tempo vai afetar em sua dor ou não. Corrida Você que deseja correr no parque, na avenida ou na praia, confira aqui se as condições do tempo estão boas para praticar esse esporte ao ar livre. Se o dia não está bom para correr ao ar livre então procure uma esteira ou vá até a academia, mas não deixe de praticar exercícios físicos. Chapinha Esse ícone é para você que quer arrasar no penteado! Será que o tempo está favorável para alisar o seu cabelo? Todo mundo sabe que quando a umidade do ar está muito alta, o cabelo alisado encolhe! Confira aqui se o sinal está verde para a prancha ou se vai perder tempo alisando as madeixas. Se o tempo não estiver muito bom, que tal ficar com o look natural? IUV O índice IUV mede o nível de radiação solar na superfície da Terra. Quanto maior for o índice, maior é o risco de danos à pele, assim, a SOMAR alerta para ficar menos tempo exposto diretamente ao sol. Quando o índice UV for extremo, há necessidade de proteção intensa: Evitar ficar exposto ao sol, usar filtro solar (de maior fator possível) ou bloqueador solar. Usar chapéu, óculos escuros e camiseta. A pele fica exposta a radiação solar até mesmo em dias nublados e chuvosos, por isso é recomendado o uso de filtro solar diariamente Mosquitos Baseado em estudos científicos o índice de mosquitos revela se as condições do tempo são favoráveis (ou não) a proliferação desses insetos em sua cidade. Antes de fazer aquela viagem para a praia, ou para o campo, confira as informações do índice de mosquito e esteja preparado para proteger-se contra esses bichinhos irritantes. Artrite Com o intuito de colaborar com o bem estar da população a Somar desenvolveu o índice de artrite. Quando o tempo pode influenciar em sua artrite? A baixa temperatura, alto grau de umidade e pressão atmosférica influenciam na dor reumática em diferentes maneiras, mas depende muito da sensibilidade de cada pessoa. Com algumas ferramentas alertamos se o tempo vai afetar em sua dor ou não. Corrida Você que deseja correr no parque, na avenida ou na praia, confira aqui se as condições do tempo estão boas para praticar esse esporte ao ar livre. Se o dia não está bom para correr ao ar livre então procure uma esteira ou vá até a academia, mas não deixe praticar este exercício. Atenção, esse índice visa o entretenimento e seu uso não é de responsabilidade do Tempo Agora.

Works with ALL versions of Android including versions 4.1+!!! Read below first!!! NOTE: Make sure to have Go Locker AND Go Launcher installed! Go Locker themes are automatically added to the themes menu within the Go Locker app. Please do not rate the theme poorly for install issues. (5 for custom shortcuts, 1 for unlock). Get Stargate 6 Go Locker Theme, a unique and high performance lockscreen for your phone! To use, you need to touch the shortcut you desire on the "DHD" and then swipe to the center. When you release your finger, it will open your shortcut. You can change the shortcuts by opening the "Theme set" from within the theme's menu in Go Locker. ***EXTRA NOTE: Due to recent updates with Go Locker, the shortcuts cannot be customized. If this feature is important to you, please contact the Go Locker developers to let them know you want this function fixed (I have already done so as well). Наверняка с вами бывало такое, что находясь в транспорте или на отдыхе вам хотелось немного размять свой мозг? Специально для вас мы создали приложение на Android - сборник логических задач! Это приложение позволит вам получить доступ к самым лучшим и качественным логическим задачкам. А благодаря частым обновлениям - оно вам никогда не надоест! Проверьте свои навыки решения логических задач! Попробуйте самые различные упражнения на логику, смекалку и наблюдательность. Решите их все! В программе вы найдете занимательные логические задачи на самую разную тематику: математические, физические, исторические, задачи на смекалку, задачи-шутки, задачи с подвохом, а также разнообразные логические загадки. Задачи встречаются разного уровня сложности: от тех, которые могут решить даже дети, до задач олимпиадного уровня. Вы можете также поделиться задачками со своими друзьями! Все логические задачи в программе уже с ответами. Но не торопитесь нажимать на кнопку "Ответ", поломайте голову в поисках решения и получите истинное удовольствие при совпадении вашего ответа с предложенным вариантом. Surely you have this happen, that while in transport or on vacation you want to stretch your brain a little? Especially for you we have created an application on Android - a collection of logical tasks! This application will allow you to get access to the best quality and logical puzzles. And thanks to frequent updates - you will never get bored! Test your skills by solving logic problems! Try a variety of exercises on logic, wit and observation. Solve them all! In the program you will find entertaining logical tasks to the most different subjects: mathematics, physics, history, objectives for smart, problem-jokes, problems with trick, as well as a variety of logic puzzles. Problems are encountered different levels of complexity, from those that can solve even the kids, to Olympiad level tasks. You can also share the puzzles with your friends! All logic problems in the program have the answers. But do not hurry to click on the "Reply" smash his head in search of solutions and get pleasure when matching your answer with the proposed option.
release_text: 1.3: Уважаемые игроки, спасибо за то что вы с нами! Мы решили сделать абсолютно все задачки бесплатными, теперь они доступны всем без исключения.

app_name: Bass Drop Drum and Bass LITE
description: Bass Drop Drum and Bass is designed for anyone who listens to or makes Drum and Bass music. It lets you play massive DnB synths, filthy bass lines, drum and percussion loops, sound fx, and dirty noises. It's extremely fun to play with and lets you create your own patterns from a vast array of sounds. Features: ◆ Studio quality samples, created by professional musicians and producers. ◆ Load and save up to 3 different sound bank layouts. ◆ Shape assigned pads, for straightforward use. ◆ Pitch resample all samples. ◆ 24 fully editable sample pads ◆ 1 octave keyboard (13 keys) with pitch shifting spanning 5 octaves. ◆ 5 different synthesizers. ◆ ADSR and synthesizer volume adjustment. ◆ Sample Pads Select a sample for each pad and customise its volume, pitch, and loop duration. Layer up to 24 looping or touch triggered pads at once. ◆ Synthesizer Choose from 5 different synthesizer types to create your riffs and bass lines. Select the central octave with the octave + or – buttons, and pitch shift up to three notes at once in real time with the pitch shift wheel. ◆ADSR Use the rotating potometers to alter the attack, decay, release and sustain of your synth to get the perfect sound to fit your creation. ★★ Community★★ For the latest updates and to connect to the F.T.M. community: - Search and like Fresh Touch Media on Facebook - Follow @freshtouchapps on Twitter Tutorial videos and more music apps: http://www.freshtouchmedia.com Check out our other electronic music apps: Bass Drop Dubstep - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.freshtouchmedia.bassdrop Bass Drop Trap - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.freshtouchmedia.bdtrap

description: Ever wanted to be a princess and live in a beautiful castle? Your dream comes true with My Princess Castle! Create and dress princesses and have them living in castles decorated by yourself! The best princess game of all times is here! YOUR OWN PRINCESS Stop by the exclusive beauty salon to create and customize your own princess just the way you want! Pick her hairstyle, her eyes, her clothes and even her jewelry, tiara and shoes -- all of the things a real princess can’t live without! You can even dress and name her after your favorite princess of all times! What will it be? Snow White, Cinderella, Aurora, Ariel, Belle, Jasmine, Pocahontas, Mulan, Tiana, Rapunzel, Anna, Elsa? It’s all up to you! YOUR OWN CASTLE Pick your favorite castles and give them your personal touch with over a hundred different and beautiful items for every type of room you can imagine. Don’t forget to add cute dolls, puppies and kitties to play with! Use your creativity to design incredible living rooms, bedrooms, bathrooms, kitchens and much more. When you are done, take a picture of your lovely castle or room to save it forever and share it with your best friends! My Princess Castle brings back all the magic, fantasy and enjoyment of princesses and their adorable castles. HIGHLIGHTS • Countless combinations for your princess doll • Many models of castles • Incredibly cute illustrations • Designed for people of all ages, from kids to adults • Over 100 exclusive decoration items • Cute dolls, puppies and kitties Live this fairy tale! Play My Princess Castle now and have fun with princesses and castles! Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

description: TapCounter is an useful counter for repetitive tasks. Do you have to send all those postcards for christmas? or count the laps in the track of your son? Push the menu button to see extra options: subtracting (in case you've made a mistake), restarting the counter, setting a value, a settings panel...

Olena Shypilova presents the free course “Finnish in 7 Lessons” for RUSSIAN speakers, an application that will help you bring your Finnish skills to a level of comfortable communication on basic topics! Application developed by http://speakasap.com . Tailored to beginners, this course is simple, logical, structured and short. The course includes only Basic Finnish grammar, the type of grammar used most by people all over the world for everyday communication in Finnish. Every lesson is offered in audio format: we provide understandable explanations that make it easy for you to listen to our course anytime on the go. All the exercises address a specific topic with useful and common vocabulary. All answers are provided in audio format. In contrast to typical exercises where you simply click on the correct translation of a word or the correct verb form, leading to boredom and the inability to think on your own, we composed our exercises in a different way. In our exercises you translate the whole sentence at once. You can always check your answers. You will find 80% of all words used in the exercises either in the lesson materials or in previous exercises, so it’s not necessary to consult a dictionary all the time. Moreover, memorizing new words comes with practice, especially when you construct phrases or sentences without assistance. Features: • Full version of the free course “Finnish in 7 Lessons” • Interactive exercises for assessing your knowledge and teaching the material • Audio materials with the explanations of the lessons and exercises • Video materials with the explanations of the lessons (requires an internet connection) • Easily access speakASAP online • Quickly get in touch with the Support service • All materials (except video materials) are stored on your electronic device and available without an internet connection Join our groups: http://vk.com/speakASAP http://www.facebook.com/speakASAP http://twitter.com/speakASAP http://blog.speakasap.com Join our YouTube Channel: http://www.youtube.com/user/eustudy We will be happy to receive any comments and propositions from you. Write us at mobile@speakasap.com Install! Test it! Let us know about bugs! Study with pleasure! For additional information refer to our site http://speakasap.com/ru/finnish-in-7-lessons The course’s founder Olena Shypilova and the speakASAP team.

Now featuring the voice of Nancy O'Dell!! StoryChimes is proud to partner with Nancy O'Dell (co-host of Entertainment Tonight) in raising funds for the Muscular Dystrophy Association. Rapunzel is the classic tale about a beautiful young girl who is a victim of circumstance. She’s trapped in an isolated tower deep in the forest. The evil sorceress has her held captive against her will. Only the young prince can save her from her lonely fate. Enjoy the read! StoryChimes Application Description  StoryChimes are an affordable diverse collection of children’s stories designed to immerse your child in the sights and sounds of interactive tales while keeping the “feel” of turning the pages of a real book. As we like to say, “When you hear the chime, turn the page!” StoryChimes’ stream of new titles will keep you coming back for more fun, adventure and education again and again. The ease-of-use makes it a snap for even the youngest kids to enjoy a StoryChime today. Mom or Dad need a good distraction? No matter how you travel or where you are, StoryChimes are never more than a touch away. An entire collection of books in the palm of your hand, providing a great assortment of entertainment. StoryChimes are the perfect alternative to movies, tv shows and video games. With StoryChimes you can entertain and educate at the same time. Grab one today! description: ArtHDR is a camera app that can capture a high dynamic range (HDR) photo from multiple shots with different exposures. This is an ad-free version. Please note that "ArtHDR Pro" has no extra functions compared to "ArtHDR". Have you ever been in a situation that you couldn't take a picture as you expect? Try ArtHDR. It is a real-HDR (High Dynamic Range) camera app that offers an enhancement of the picture quality in such cases. * How does it work? By cherry-picking fine exposed regions from 3 pictures taken with different exposures, ArtHDR can capture a realistic picture of a scene that has a wide range of brightness. Additionally, you can adjust the picture appearance according to your taste in various ways. * Features Shooting is one-touch. The app automatically takes 3 pictures. Since some camera shakes and object motions will be corrected, you don't need to freeze while shooting. The unique HDR algorithm achieved a balance between an artistic picture quality and processing time on mobile devices. Photo examples are shared on my SNS accounts. Please check it out. + http://instagram.com/arthdr_app + https://twitter.com/arthdr_app + http://www.facebook.com/arthdrapp + http://arthdr-app.tumblr.com

・初回の通信量が大きいため、初回のダウンロード時は、Wi-Fi環境やLTE等の高速回線のご利用を強く推奨します。また、本アプリのダウンロードの際には多くの通信量が発生するため、パケット定額制サービスに加入されることを強く推奨いたします。本サービス利用に関わる一切の通信料･接続料はお客様のご負担となり、通信会社が取り決めている一定の通信量を超えた際の速度規制に該当した場合でも、当社は一切の責任を負いません。 ・本アプリはデータ容量が大きい為、ダウンロードに15分以上かかる場合があります。その為GooglePlayが提供している「アプリ購入15分以内の払い戻しサービス」をご利用頂けない場合があります。 ・ダウンロードは通常、外部ストレージ（端末対応のSDカード等）に行われますが、機種によっては強制的に内部ストレージにダウンロードされる場合もありますのでご注意ください。 ◆◆◆　アプリのご紹介　◆◆◆ ●「シンデレラブレイド 完全版」は、パチスロ機をAndroidアプリ用に限りなく再現したものです。 ●設定ごとのART当選確率やその他スペックは、実際のパチスロ機とほぼ同一ですが、実際のパチスロ機の動作とは異なる場合があります。 ART上乗せ完全自力ガチ抽選「おしりペンペンタイム」を搭載し、パチスロ版シンデレ­ラ物語「シンデレラブレイド」が登場。通常時は、32G毎にART突入のチャンスが訪­れる「熟練度システム」でシンデレラの剣レベルをアップ！行く手を阻むお姉さまを倒せ­ば、純増2.2枚の高純増ART「武闘会」に突入だ！ 【アプリ機能説明】 ◆オートプレイ機能 「シンデレラブレイド」には、オートプレイ機能を標準搭載しております。 オートプレイ機能には、「ゆっくりオートプレイ」と「快速オートプレイ」の2種類を用意しております。 ゆっくりオートプレイ：液晶演出の終了を待ってから次ゲームが開始されます。 快速オートプレイ：液晶演出をキャンセルしたウェイトカットでのオートプレイとなります。 ◆自動セーブ機能 自動セーブ機能を標準搭載しておりますので、アプリが終了した場合や電池切れの場合でも、次回遊技時は、前回遊技の終了時から開始する事が可能です。 ◆設定の公開 メニュー画面のオプション項目で任意の設定を選んで遊技可能です。 ランダム設定を選択した場合のみ、遊技終了まで設定はわかりません。その場合、セーブをせずに遊技を終了する場合のみ、それまでの遊技の設定を閲覧する事が可能です。 ◆液晶画面拡大機能 アプリ上の液晶画面をタップすることで液晶画面を拡大・縮小することが可能です。 ◆◆◆　よくあるお問い合わせ　◆◆◆ １．ダウンロードが開始されない。 決済不具合の可能性があります。ご利用の決済サービス（Google or お客様ご契約の通信キャリア）へお問い合わせください。 Google Play ダウンロードに関するトラブルシューティング https://support.google.com/googleplay/answer/1067233 ２．インストールの失敗。起動できない。起動後の画面が真っ暗など。 リソースデータのダウンロード、展開に失敗している可能性があります。 アンインストールして、外部ストレージ（端末対応のSDカード等）の空き容量を確認いただき、再度ダウンロードしてください。 ３．接続待機中と表示され、それ以降進まない。 「Wi-Fi接続時にのみダウンロードする」をチェック選択した状態でダウンロードを開始し、「Wi-Fi」接続されていない場合に起こります。一旦キャンセルしてチェック選択を外してから、再度ダウンロードしてください。 ４．追加課金はありますか？ 本アプリ内での追加課金は一切ございません。 ５．アプリを解約（退会）について 本アプリは、月額利用料を必要としない単体販売のアプリです。解約（退会）の手続きは必要ありません。 ６．再ダウンロードについて 同一アカウントであれば、無償で何度もダウンロード可能です。 同一アカウントであれば、無償で複数の端末へダウンロード可能です。 ◆◆◆　問い合わせについて　◆◆◆ 携帯メール(スマートフォン含む)でお問い合わせの際は「@net-fun.co.jp」からメールを受信できるようにご設定をお願い致します。 なお、お問い合わせの際には ①【ご購入アプリ名】 ②【ご利用端末名】 ③【OSバージョン】 ④【Google Playの注文番号】 ⑤【不具合内容】 を明記の上お問い合わせください。 Finally appeared in full version of the description: *Now also with metric measurements and needles!* You know each knitting pattern is unique, but did you know there are basic constructional elements that make up the base of most patterns? Raglanify will be your knitting partner by guiding you through the construction of a top-down raglan pullover sweater! Use the generated pattern as a complete raglan pullover pattern, or modify it by incorporating your own design elements to make a unique creation of your very own! Enter your measurements and choose your options: -Neckline: boat, crew, or v-neck. -Waist shaping: turn on or off. -Arm tapering: turn on or off. -Choose any length for sleeves and torso, -Choose any length for ribbing or add your own edging. The possibilities are endless! -Refer to and modify the pattern at any time. -Email the pattern to yourself to build on your base design.* Make one for yourself and everyone in your family for quick Holiday or winter gifts! :) *Note for 4.0 (Ice Cream Sandwich) or higher: The email function is not fully supported as of yet.*

Pinball 3D - a cyber Pinball HD! Full 3D graphics! Realism! High quality effects and sounds! The dynamics and speed! Stylish! Play and have fun! In the future, new tables! Necessary: Android v2.2 Froyo or High Processor ARM-7 or High Support device with screen resolution 320x480 up to 800x1280 Internet for Global Leaderboard!

See how high you can reach in this addictive Streetball juggling game! Juggle the ball up in the air as high as you can to boldly go where no ball has gone before, but don't let it fall in the Fire!!! Share your golf highscores with friends Enjoy beautiful graphics Watch the ball go on fire Buy upgrades from the Shop

¿Acabas de empezar a aprender inglés? ¿Necesitas mejorar tu vocabulario? ¿Planeas viajar a un país de habla inglesa? "Aprende inglés con tarjetas" te ayudará a aprender los conceptos básicos sin necesidad de conocimientos previos. Características: - Vocabulario inglés básico y medio - Multitud de expresiones organizadas en diferentes categorías y situaciones, como saludos (greetings), en el hotel (at the hotel), en el aeropuerto (at the airport), el clima (the weather), etc. - Integración con el sintetizador de voz de Android para que puedas escuchar la pronunciación correcta tanto con el acento americano como con el británico. - No necesita conexión a Internet, perfecto para tus viajes o cuando no hay conexión de datos disponible - Mueve la aplicación a la tarjeta SD para ahorrar memoria interna del teléfono *** Características exclusivas de la versión extendida *** - Cientos de nuevas expresiones y palabras - Preposiciones y adverbios interrogativos con ejemplos - Sin publicidad La actualización para obtener las nuevas características se realiza como una compra desde aplicación. No es necesario instalar ninguna nueva aplicación :) Estamos encantados de recibir tus comentarios. Si piensas que la app merece una calificación por debajo de 5 estrellas, por favor envíanos un email para darnos la oportunidad de resolver tus dudas: support.android (arroba) movinapp.com Preguntas frecuentes: P:¿Cómo puedo cambiar la velocidad de la voz? R: La velocidad de la voz esta controlada por el motor TTS instalado en Android. Se puede configurar a través de: Configuración -> Entrada de voz y los ajustes de salida -> Ajustes de voz -> velocidad de la voz P: ¿Cómo puedo cambiar el acento de la voz? R: Sólo tienes que ir a Menú -> Configuración y seleccionar el idioma. Hay dos acentos disponibles: * Inglés (EE.UU.) * Inglés (Reino Unido) P: ¿Qué tipo de expresiones voy a aprender? R: Vas a encontrar expresiones para las situaciones más habituales al visitar países anglófonos, pero también vocabulario básico y medio. Más de 2000 palabras y expresiones se incluyen en la versión PRO.

This is an app for the loved ones of those who serve, which will help teach your child life skills. Developed for parents and caregivers: The Sesame Street for Military Families app puts all of Sesame’s bilingual (English & Spanish) resources for military families right in your pocket! Use your mobile device to access engaging videos, articles, storybooks, parent guides, and more to help you support your preschool and school-aged children as they encounter transitions common to military families. Because of the sensitive topics in this app, we highly recommend that a parent or guardian previews the materials before co-viewing with a child. TOPIC AREAS INCLUDE • Deployments • Homecomings • Injuries • Grief • Self-Expression About Sesame Street for Military Families This app and its materials are an extension of Sesame Workshop’s ongoing efforts to support our troops and their families. Related materials include the Feel Electric! app for military children, social media including Facebook.com/SesameStreetForMilitaryFamilies, and the website MilitaryFamiliesNearAndFar.org, which provides engaging tools for military children to create, communicate, and stay connected.
release_text: The newly redesigned Sesame Street for Military Families app provides you with the same great resources, but now with a fresh look and easier navigation.

description: Mit dieser Fischbestimmungshilfe hoffe ich, gerade für uns Angler, eine einfache Lösung zu bieten, mit der man seinen aktuellen Fang besser bestimmen (und/oder zuweisen) kann. In Zukunft werde ich auch noch weitere Fischarten integrieren, es ist aber nie Ziel gewesen, möglichst "alle" Fischarten aufzuführen - dies würde definitiv den Rahmen sprengen. Die aufgeführten Infos zu den Fischen sind möglichst auf ein Minimum reduziert, in der Hoffnung noch das Wichtigste "mitgenommen zu haben" - die App versteht sich nicht als Fischlexikon! Der FishFinder 3.0 ist eher als kleines Nachschalgewerk für unterwegs gedacht... Für mehr und detailliertere Informationen, gibt es aber wieder jeweils einen Link zur entsprechenden Wikipedia Seite. In diesem Fall müssten natürlich die Wikipedia-Daten übers Internet abrufen, alle sämtlichen anderen Inhalte der App (Bilder, Texte usw.) sind aber selbstverständlich offline verfügbar. Die App benötigt keine Rechte! Suchfunktion Mit Hilfe der eingebauten Suche, kannst Du gezielt die angezeigten Fisch filtern, um möglichst einfach (und schnell) an das gewünschte "Ergebnis" zu gelangen. Du kannst z.B. auch direkt nach den Schuppen entlang der Seitenlinie suchen (Seitenlinienschuppen), denn dies ist eine sehr gute Möglichkeit, eine präzise Fischbestimmung vorzunehmen. Dazu brauchst Du nur eine beliebige (Schuppen) Zahl in das Suchfeld einzugeben - und schon werden nur noch die Fische angezeigt, die in dieses "Raster" passen. Voraussetzung dafür ist natürlich, dass es auch die passenden Daten zu dem gesuchten Fisch gibt, denn leider ist dies nicht (aus verschiedenen Gründen) auf alle Fischarten anwendbar. Es ist natürlich auch möglich, sich alle schuppenlosen Fischarten anzeigen zu lassen, in diesem Fall einfach "schuppenlos" eingeben. Eigentlich befindet sich die App noch (mehr oder weniger) in der Testphase, wenn also etwas nicht richtig funktioniert, oder falsch ist, würde ich mich über eine kurze Info sehr freuen... *** Für mehr Informationen zu dieser App *** https://www.netzangler.de/angler-app-zur-fischbestimmung-fishfinder-3-0 This fish identification help I hope, just for us anglers, a simple solution to offer that lets you determine its current catch better (and / or assign) can. In future I will integrate even more fish species, but it is never been objective as possible perform "all" species - this would definitely exceed the scope. The information set out to fish are reduced to a minimum as possible, "having taken" still the most important thing in the hope - the app itself as fish encyclopedia! The Fishfinder 3.0 is meant to be used as a small Nachschalgewerk go ... For more and detailed information, but there are again each have a link to the corresponding Wikipedia page. In this case, of course, would the Wikipedia data call over the Internet, all the all the other contents of the app (images, text, etc.) but are of course available offline. The app does not require any rights! Search function Using the built-in search, you can filter the displayed targeted fish to reach as simple (and fast) to the desired "result". You can, for example, also search directly on the scales along the lateral line (sideline shed), because this is a very good way to make an accurate determination of fish. For this you need only an arbitrary (shed) to enter numbers into the search box - and the fish will only display that will fit into this "grid". This requires of course that there is also the appropriate data to the fish sought, because unfortunately this is not (for various reasons) apply to all fish species. Of course, it is also possible to display all scaleless fish species, simply enter in this case "without scales". Actually, the app is still (more or less) in the testing phase, so if something is not working properly, or is wrong, I would appreciate a brief info very ... *** For more information about this app *** https://www.netzangler.de/angler-app-zur-fischbestimmung-fishfinder-3-0
