description: City Jump is executing mysterious task, jumping between buildings, to avoid obstacles on the wall, to kill monsters, birds, and other enemies on the way. * Tap screen to jump * Kill enemy by jumping in the air * Avoid hurdles on walls * POW UP when killing 3 enemies of the same kind.

FlightStats is a free real-time flight status and airport tracking application. Take control of your day-of-travel by downloading FlightStats: - Quickly access worldwide flight status by flight number, airport or route - Watch flights as they move across the world on our gorgeous flight tracker - Scan essential information like departure/arrival times, delay indexes, gates and weather - Check the flight timeline to get in-depth descriptions of all activities about your flight FlightStats is a leader in global flight and airport information services. Our flight status, trip monitoring and flight alert solutions are trusted by millions of travelers every day.
release_text: 2.0.5 addresses the battery issues that some have experienced.

description: Cache Cleaner works for both non-root and root users. Clear all your cache and free up space with a single click! You can also setup an auto clear interval. Clearing your cache frees up internal storage and could improve the performance of your device. ☆ 1-tap to clear all caches ☆ Auto clear intervals (1, 2, 6, 24, 48 Hour, 1 Week options) ☆ Auto clear on reboot ☆ Clear cache for specified application ☆ View internal storage information TIPS: ☆ If you want to clear all caches you don't have to wait for the app list to finish loading. Just click the button ;) ☆ If you have any bugs please email me and I'll be glad to help out. This app supports ads. Please consider supporting future development and purchase the donate version :D

A simple App to Backup and Restore SMS Messages. This is a Paid No-Ads version of the Ad-Supported Free App. NOTE: In Q1 of 2016, this paid app will be discontinued. However the free version of this app will remain, and we will be adding new features to it, including making it ad-free. If you need an SMS backup app right now, we encourage you to download the free version. Note: We will also be adding the ability to backup Call Logs at that time! The free app will allow both SMS and Call Logs backup, and will allow you to restore existing backups you made using any of our SMS or Call Logs apps. Thank you, and we look forward to providing some exciting new features soon! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ * The app creates backups locally on the phone by default unless you configure it to upload to Email, Google Drive or Dropbox. You are responsible for backup files and the files are not sent to the developer in any case. On Android 4.4+ devices, if you have performed the Restore and the messages don't appear in your messaging app then: - Open your messaging app and Disable SMS from Settings. - Exit the app - Open the app again and Enable SMS from Settings. APP FEATURES: - Backup SMS Messages in XML format. - Backup created locally on the device with options to automatically upload to Email, Google Drive or DropBox using the Add-On app. - Choose a scheduled time to automatically backup. - Backup format is independent of the Android version so the messages can be easily moved from one phone to another, irrespective of the Android version. - Option to select which conversations to backup. - View/Restore all Messages or only selected conversations. - Delete all SMS Messages on the Phone. - Email a backup file. - The XML can then be converted to other formats, and can also be viewed on a computer. - Tested on Android v1.5 to v4.4.2 On newer phones with inbuilt storage the default backup location will probably be the internal storage card and not the external. This is because the phone reports the storage that way. If you intend to do a factory reset on the phone, please make sure you save/email a copy of the backup outside the phone before doing it. Lots more info at http://android.riteshsahu.com/apps/sms-backup-restore FAQs can be found at http://bit.ly/d9t7Jk Please start the app at least once after updates so that the scheduled backups start working. This App needs access to the following: * Your messages: Backup and Restore messages. Receive SMS permission needed to properly handle messages received while the app is the default messaging app on Android 4.4+ devices. * Storage: To create the Backup file on the SD card. * Phone calls - Without this the Restore fails on some phones. * Your social information: To display and store the contact names in the Backup file. * Run at start-up: Start scheduled Backups. * Control Vibration: To vibrate the phone when an operation is completed. * Prevent Phone from Sleeping: To prevent the phone from going to sleep/suspended state while a Backup or Restore operation is in progress. * Test access to Protected Storage: To create the Backup file on the SD card. Icons designed by Vlad Kitanoski of www.vk-solutions.com
release_text: v7.45, 7.46: - Fix for some app crash problems. v7.43, 7.44: - Fixed app crash due to external SD Card issues on Lollipop devices. v7.42: - Added warning about large backups in Emails. - Added note about Textra not showing all messages after restore. v7.40, 7.41: - External SD Card support for Lollipop (Android 5.0+) devices - Added Ukrainian translations thanks to Євген Гіль v7.29: - Fix for Archive Mode backup errors

description: Do you pay more than you order for? Do you usually forget what you drank? Your solution is Count your Drinks. You can easily note what you had, like beer, shots, cocktails, wine, soda...

Dragon Village is a Dragon Fighting Breeding City Builder free 2 play fun game. Start a magical tour with mystical dragons. Imagine a village full of amazing dragons where you can feed, raise and train your dragons for fighting! ~ COLLECT mystifying, strong, and amusing dragons from over 12 elements! Each of the dragons has unique personality, unique magical powers and unique skills. ~ CROSSBREED your dragons in the breeding lab and create a new dragon! ~ FARM delicious food in the food farm and FEED them to your dragons! ~ BATTLE with your enemies and unlock new items! ~ SHARE your own village, full of magical dragons with your friends and help each other with gifts. FEATURES: - Free to play! - Cool graphics! - A wide range of exciting pet dragons. - The whole island is open for you! -Evolve your Dragons into epic form and explore an exciting fun world! -Play with friends using Facebook and Game Center in Social area! -Cute eggs. -Custom elemental habitats for each type of dragons. -The Decor area is filled with stylish and attractive decorations. -Farms to grow foods for your dragons. -Various battle stages where your dragons can compete for prizes. - A crossbreeding mechanism, which brings out surprisingly realistic results! -Make your own team of Dragons and take them to battle!

Fight for your honor in epic, explosive online multiplayer tank battles. Join millions of players and take on legions of commanders from all over the world in team-based skirmishes and chaotic free-for-all conflicts. ENLIST TODAY! Jump into a tank and go straight into battle. Join one of the thousands of powerful Legions or start your own and become a force to be reckoned with. STORM THE BATTLEFIELD Roll into one of five stunning battlefields. Blow away anything in your sights in three frantic game modes: Free-For-All, Team, and Finders Keepers. YOUR TANK, YOUR RULES Choose from a range of powerful tanks then build it up to suit your playstyle! A deep upgrade system allows you to tweak firepower, speed, accuracy and more, as well as stat-boosting patterns and decals for a competitive edge. IRON FORCE FEATURES: • Play online with friends or against players from all over the world! • Jump straight into the action and start battling immediately! • Join one of thousands of legions or create your own and build an army • Fight in three game modes: Free-for-all, Team, and Finders Keepers • Compete in weekly ranked tournaments to win awesome prizes. For more info and all the latest news check out Iron Force on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/IronForceGame What are you waiting for, commander? Important Consumer Information. This app: Requires acceptance of EA's Privacy & Cookie Policy, TOS and EULA. Contains advertisments for EA and its partners. Collects data through third party analytics technology (see Privacy & Cookie Policy for details). Requires a persistent Internet connection (network fees may apply). Contains direct links to the Internet and social networking sites intended for an audience over 13. Allows players to communicate via Facebook notifications and gifting. To disable see the settings in-game. Terms of Service : http://www.ea.com/terms-of-service Privacy & Cookie Policy : http://www.ea.com/privacy-policy EULA : http://tos.ea.com/legalapp/mobileeula/US/en/GM/ Visit http://www.chillingo.com/about/game-faqs/ for assistance or inquiries. EA may retire online features and services after 30 days notice posted on www.ea.com/1/service-updates
release_text: NEW MAP Commanders, welcome to our new battlefield set in a disused steel foundry. Where mighty flames once forged pure steel now iron rules as legions take on legions and tanks take on tanks in this industrial wasteland. NEW MINI PACK OUR BEST VALUE PACK YET includes a 2 Day Gold Medal and a 2 Day Pattern that will boost your fire speed. Please note that once purchased the Mini Pack cannot be purchased again for a period of two weeks."

description: 2048, a simple addictive and challenge puzzle game, join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile! This is the android port of the 2048 game made by Gabriele Cirulli https://github.com/gabrielecirulli/2048 How to play: - Swipe(Up, Down, Left, Right) to move the tiles. - Two same number tiles touch and merge into 2x one tile. - You win the game when the 2048 tile created. Features: - Simple design and play easily. - Beautiful bird and sky scenery - Leaderboards in friends circle and world. How to win: http://www.dailydot.com/technology/how-to-win-2048/ Technical - http://stackoverflow.com/questions/22342854/what-is-the-optimal-algorithm-for-the-game-2048

description: Handy text tools including: - Uppercase - converts all characters to upper case - Lowercase - converts all characters to lower case - Count characters - counts all characters in text - Count words - counts words in text - Count lines - counts new lines in text - Rotate 13 - Moves each character with 13 positions forward in the ASCII table - Sort lines alpha - Sorts text lines alphabetically - Word frequency - How many times each word is used - Character frequency - How many times each character is used - Column from table - Allows you to get text column from HTML table. Copy and paste the table content in the text field and type the column number you want to extract then press Start - Trim lines - removes whitespace from end of lines - Replace text - replaces one string with another - Format JSON - pretty format JSON string - URLEncode - Encode string as URL safe string - URLDecode - Decode URL safe string as regular string - base64encode - Encode text as base64 - base64decode - Decode base64 sting - Add line numbers - Add line number before every line of text - Split text - Splits text by separator
release_text: - Added replace with new line - Fixed replace - Slimmer app

description: To use this skin, you must installed "Me Clock". . How to use: 1) Download "Me Clock-analog,digital widget" before using this skin . https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=jp.androidmedia.meclockwidget How to use: 1) Download "Me Clock-analog,digital widget" before using this skin . https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=jp.androidmedia.meclockwidget 2) Hold down your finger on the home screen. 3) Add "Me Clock Widget" from your widget list. 4) Pick this skin from the list. 5)The widget will appear in your homescreen. This 7Segment LED design digital clock widget is really cool. Free and no ads. What's "Me Clock Widget": - Design skins many themes.(Analog clock, Digital clock, Simple, Cool, and Elegant) - 24-hour format supported.(Digital clock) - Date format supported.(Digital clock) - Support scaling widget(Android4.0+) - Lock screen widget(Android4.2+) - Launch Application by tapping the clock widget.(Alarm, Calendar,any other) - Free and no ads. Thank you.

Turn your phone into the best pocket mirror! Do you need to check your look or maybe put on makeup? You forgot your pocket mirror? Now with MakeUp Mirror in your phone, you won't need it anymore! MakeUp Mirror is the best solution to use your phone as a mirror. Try it now! Key features: - Simple to use - Zoom and Exposure controls - Button to freeze image - Awesome image visibility - Gesture controls - Light frame - Save & share your best selfie! If you have tried some others mirrors that didn't convinced you, you have to try MakeUp Mirror. This will be the last mirror app you will have to download! Are you wondering why this app is better than only use your front camera? Here you have a few reasons: - Much brighter image. (Check it yourself!) - On Screen and gesture controls. - You can freeze the image without taking a photo. - Light frame allows you to use the mirror even in low light situations. - No need to be alternating between the front and the back facing camera.

description: An easy & interactive way to get a good basic understanding of human anatomy (name, placement and shape of muscles & bones) , also includes detailed illustrations and information for those that want to take it one step further. View all muscles and bones in full interactive 3D (rotate, zoom, pan & touch) or through the help of interactive 2D charts. Test and improve your knowledge by taking the 3D quizzes, search muscles & bones by keyword or get to know more about specific bones or muscles through detailed illustrations and information. VALIDITY: This app and the content thereof is created in co-operation with TotalHealth (www.totalhealth.eu); an educational center, based in the Netherlands, specialized in regular & alternative medicine. This app has been thoroughly checked, if however you may find some mistakes, contact me (it will be fixed in an update). CONTACT Feel free to contact me with any questions, comments or ideas for possible updates. tags: learn, test, physiology, map, skeleton, anatomie, learning, latin, name, location, body, exam, chart, 3d, human, muscular system
release_text: ▷Improved navigation ▷Search functionality ▷Support for multiple languages ▷Interactive 2D Charts ▷Improved performance ▷Improved visual layout

description: IP Camera Viewer for Apexis allows, via WiFi or mobile 3G connection, to perform the following actions: - Remotely control up to 8 cameras - Move the camera by sliding your finger on the screen - Take snapshots IP Camera Viewer for Apexis is designed for Apexis IP cameras using MJPEG format and all compatible models. Important: To reach the camera from internet (not local network) it is needed to forward/NAT the IP/port in the router.

Smooth Controls, Explosive Action, and Thrilling Escapes! Fireball: Special Edition is an addictive and challenging, arcade survival game. Dodge swarms of enemies and lead them to their destruction across 3 modes and 2 difficulty levels. * Use Meltdown mode to slow down the action and escape from certain death. * In Waves mode, play through 8 consecutive waves of increasing size and speed. * In Countdown mode, play 5 unique stages of 3 minutes each and try to score as high as you can with massive combos. * In Survival mode, play 5 more stages where the goal is to stay alive as long as possible. Like all Radiangames' titles, Fireball SE is works on Android phones or tablets of any size. Check out what reviewers are said about Fireball SE: "Fireball SE has the energy and appeal to last for quite some time." (8 out of 10) - PocketGamer "It's smart, polished, and above all, immediate." - Eurogamer

description: TESTSIEGER!!! Das Android Magazin kürt die Kochmeister Rezepte App zum Testsieger mit der maximalen Bewertung von fünf ★★★★★ Sternen ! ✔✔✔ NEU: Universal-App - Anzeige sowohl für Handys als auch Tablets optimiert. ✔✔✔ „Die App der Kochmeister Community besticht mit einer Auswahl von unglaublichen 60.000 Rezepten. Frei nach dem Motto: Wer da nicht satt wird, ist selber schuld. Dank der übersichtlichen Suche behält man zu jeder Zeit den Überblick. Schlaues Detail: Wer in der Suchmaske „veggy“ oder „Diät“ anwählt, erhält nur Rezepte, die diesen individuellen Wünschen entsprechen. Zusätzlich zur Rezeptsuche gibt es ein „Rezept des Tages“ und regelmäßige, saisonale Specials, beispielsweise Spargel-Gerichte im Frühjahr oder kulinarische Ideen für das Weihnachtsfest. Die App überzeugt durch eine schön gestaltete Oberfläche und die riesengroße Auswahl an Rezepten. Die aktiven Mitglieder der Community sorgen für den persönlichen Touch: sie bewerten, kommentieren und stellen eigene Rezepte zur Verfügung.“ (Auszug aus dem Android Magazin Ausgabe Juli/August 2012) Mit über 60.000 Rezepten aus der ganzen Welt ist Kochmeister eine der größten Online-Rezeptsammlungen. Die Plattform von Hobbyköchen für Hobbyköche! Hierbei handelt es sich nicht um ein erneutes "Hochglanzkochbuch" sondern um eine lebendige Rezeptsammlung aus vielen Quellen. Die aktive Community garantiert immer neue Rezepte, Kommentare und Fotos, Tag für Tag. Das Besondere: Hier kann man sich hervorragend inspirieren lassen durch spielerische Auswahl nach Landesküchen und Speisearten über die innovative iPhone Steuerung. Die Rezeptsammlung ist wird ständig kreativ erweitert von derzeit über 38.000 aktiven und registrierten Hobbyköchen. Lassen Sie sich von deren gesammelten Know-How und Kochkunst inspirieren! Sie suchen ein ganz bestimmtes Rezept oder einfach Inspiration zum Kochen? Sie möchten etwas Saisonales kochen oder einfach durch die Fülle der Rezepte schlendern? Eine Inspirationsquelle sowohl für alltägliche als auch besondere Gerichte! FEATURES : ✔ 60.000 von einer der grössten deutschen Koch-Communities geschriebene und kommentierte Rezepte ✔ ständig wechselde und erweiterbare Rezepte ✔ Innovative Auswahl nach Ländern und Art des Gerichts ✔ Special-Funktion: saisonale Specials für Jahreszeiten, Feste und Events ✔ Kommentare und Rezepttests von anderen Usern lesen ✔ Favoriten-Funktion macht Rezepte auch offline verfügbar ✔ Lieblingsrezepte in Favoriten einfach speichern und verwalten ✔ Praktische und hilfreiche Einkaufsliste Zur Information: die App benötigt Internetzugriff, da die Rezepte aufgrund der großen Menge und der ständigen Erweiterungen online in einer Datenbank gespeichert sind. TEST WINNER! The Android Magazine selects the master chef recipes app as the winner with the maximum rating of five ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Stars! ✔ ✔ ✔ NEW: Universal App - Display both mobile phones and tablet optimized. ✔ ✔ ✔ "The app of Kochmeister community offers a selection of incredible 60,000 recipes. True to the motto: Who is not satisfied there, is your own fault. Thanks to the clear search you at all times retain the overview. Sly detail: Who in the search "veggy" or "diet" dials, receives only recipes that meet these individual needs. In addition to the search for a recipe there is a "recipe of the day" and regular, seasonal specials, such as asparagus dishes in the spring or culinary ideas for Christmas. The app benefits from a nicely designed interface and the overwhelming choice of recipes. The active members of the community provide the personal touch: they rate, comment and make own recipes available. "(excerpt from the Android Magazine July / August 2012) With over 60,000 recipes from around the world Cooking Master is one of the largest online collection of recipes. The platform of amateur cooks for home cooks! This is not about a renewed "glossy cookbook" but a vibrant collection of recipes from many sources. The active community always guaranteed new recipes, comments, and photos every day. The special feature: Here you can be inspired by excellent playful Select by country kitchens and dining styles of the innovative iPhone controls. The recipe collection is constantly expanding creative of currently more than 38,000 active registered and hobby chefs. Let yourself be inspired by their accumulated know-how and good food! You are looking for a very specific recipe or just inspiration for cooking? You want to cook something Seasons or simply stroll through the abundance of recipes? A source of inspiration for both everyday and special dishes! FEATURES: ✔ 60,000 from one of the largest German cooking communities written and commented Recipes ✔ constantly wechselde and extensible recipes ✔ Innovative Select by country and type of court ✔ Special feature: seasonal specials for seasons, festivals and events ✔ Read comments and recipe testing from other users ✔ Favorites function makes recipes available offline ✔ Just save and manage favorite recipes in Favourites ✔ Practical and useful shopping list For your information, the app needs internet access because the recipes due to the large amount and the continuous extensions are stored online in a database.

description: Mahjong Solitaire Jogatina is the top choice among fans of this age old game. It is the perfect companion for those who only have a few minutes to spend or hours. The simple rules and engaging game play has made Mahjong Solitaire become one of the most popular casual games in the world. Whether you want to relax or do some brain and visual training this is the right choice of Mahjong for you. And more: this is a FREE Mahjong game! Features: * 900 puzzles and growing on every new edition * Specially designed for Android * Beautiful backgrounds to choose from * Unique tile sets! * Relaxing game play * Hints, highlights and undo options * Optimized for Retina Devices! * Complete challenging goals and get up to three stars per solved board! * Three difficulty levels: Easy, Medium and Hard * And more! Playing Mahjong Solitaire is as easy as it seems! Find and match pairs of identical tiles. When you get all tiles matched you complete the board. The game is also called Mahjongg Trails, Chinese Mahjong, Majong, Mah-jong, Kyodai, Majiang, Mah jongg and is the worldwide top played classical mahjong. Have much fun and as a side benefit you will develop your spacial reasoning, logical resources, visual memory and thinking agility. Enjoy this millennial oriental pastime.

Crush Crush Crush! is a triumph of brutal minimalistic gameplay. It will challenge your skills and test your reflexes. How strong your nerves are? Game, that you won't stop playing until you're totally exhausted: crush and destroy everything on your way! No mercy! If you miss just one obstacle - you lost. Sounds like a piece of cake? Well then try to get at least 10 points! NO IN-APPS - no pay2win, just your skills! MINIMALISTIC DESIGN - no tiny birds, no cute animals, concentrate on destruction! NON-STOP ACTION - easy to lose, easy to restart, easy to feel yourself an unstoppable one! SIMPLE CONTROLS - fly, crash and smash with only one tap

"Heart Doctor" is a fun game designed especially for kids, Girls and Babies to play and have fun in clinic hospital. Kids can pretend to be a Cardiologist and perform a surgery on Patient's heart in their clinic hospital. In this "Heart Doctor" game you will be using different surgical tools to treat the patients in pain. Start by selecting your favorite character to perform heart surgery on. Then perform the X-ray and ECG on the patient's heart. Next mark the area for surgery and cut it. Use different tools to cut veins and ribs and remove the heart. Use Blood bank to keep the blood circulating. Now place the new heart to perform the heart transplant and use needle to stitch the veins and ribs. Its sure an addictive game and all in all kids, girls and babies are going to love it. Good Luck!!! Features ====================== • Easy tap and drag game play. • This Heart Doctor game provides you with a Real life Cardiologist experience. • Choose from different tools such as X-Ray, ECG, scissor, Blood bank and Needle etc. • Kids friendly content. • No violence, horror, sex or nudity. • Backgrounds and wallpaper personalization. • Sharing on Facebook with friends & family. • No monsters, dragons, aliens or clans. • Cool BG music and HD graphics. • Suitable for the whole family. ♥♥♥ HOW SWEET ♥♥♥ Do let us know how much did you like our this Heart surgery Doctor game? If you like our games don’t forget to rate and review us. We will be pleased to hear from you, provide us with your valuable feedback or cool surgery doctor game ideas to help us improve and come up with more amazing and better games for you. And enjoy our other free casual dress up, makeover, makeup, surgery doctor games for girls & kids like kids skin, hand, toe, leg, hand, ankle, shoulder, finger surgery games, tummy, pet nail, spa dress design, sandwich cooking games etc. Write us at socialinkstudio@gmail.com

"Tiny Penguin" Play game and check your patience level Enjoy an endless Tiny Penguin adventure. Slide across islands, through the clouds and over steep hills to score maximum. Available game modes:- *** Levels mode *** Survival mode ***Survival mode- in this mode you have to score maximum, no level has to complete in this mode. *** Level mode- in this mode there are 30 interesting levels, you have to collect diamonds from the path to get rewarded. Features:- *** Procedural island generation *** Procedural graphics *** Simple one touch control *** Cute graphics and nice animations *** Two modes (levels mode & survival mode) The sweet Tiny Penguin is really excited. Unfortunately she is not a supreme master in flapping her wings and so the hills ahead seen to be a big problem. Luckily the world is full of beautiful hills which force the pace. to build up speed you have to slide along the hills by tapping on the given button on your screen.

If you liked City Island and other early simulation tycoon games, you will definitely love this new citybuilder game! Install the game, join the fun now - it's free! In City Island 2 you will build houses for your citizens, decorations and community buildings to make them happy, arrange transport via a trainstation and trains, and create jobs so you can earn money and gold from your happy citizens. People in your own city will provide quests and feedback on how well you are doing! Furthermore, you can decorate your city by placing walking paths, rivers, railroads with trains, parks and hundreds more fun and beautifully designed items. If you like playing free-to-play citygames, building a virtual city on City Island 2 is your best choice! City Island 2 - Building Story is the sequel of the popular City Island game -also by Sparkling Society- which has been downloaded approximately 10 million times. In this game, you will create your own story by developing your tiny village into a large city, with a trainstation and transport for your citizens. Discover a life in a virtual world full of quests where you have the power to build a business empire with a choice of 150+ unique items on your paradise island. It is all about balance and being creative in this city sim game. You have all the power in this epic story: have hours of free fun on this fabulous exotic island! ** FEATURES ** - Fun FREE to play tycoon game - Tablet support - HIGH QUALITY graphics - Intuitive gameplay with challenging tasks, rewards and achievements - Enjoy fun quests to help you create your own virtual paradise in this free-to-play citygame! - Build and decorate a beautiful island with more than 150 unique items, be creative! - Currencies: gold and cash - Attract citizens with parks, trees, a railway with trains, boats, decorations and community buildings - Collect profit from your commercial buildings - Upgrade your city buildings - Help your citizens build a city on this exotic island story - Collect XP and level up to unlock a new building for construction - Collect dozens of REWARDS while playing - Expand your city to create more room for constructing more buildings, and progress your village to a metropolis with tall buildings - Speed up construction / upgrade time - Lots of adventure and quests to unlock - Expand your city over land and sea - Many hours of free fun ** PLEASE NOTE! ** City Island 2 is free to play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. You may control in-app purchases made within this app using the password settings explained in the Google Play help center.

description: 2014 New Dress Up Games ， new day means a new fashion challenge! There's nothing more romantic than getting married while the birds sing happily and the sun shines so generously! And that's why our spring bride feels so lucky! Prepare her for the dreamy ceremony ahead!

Hello there little cooks! We know how much you like cooking games and trying new recipes to impress your friends or family. We have prepared for you a super recipe which you could try out at home. But first, play our game to find out what ingredients you need for this delicious recipe and how to prepare it. Help our chef prepare a lamb moussaka. As you play you could even note down the ingredients and the process. Start with the preparation of the lamb meat. Add all the ingredients to it: parsley, tomato sauce, garlic, onion, everything the arrow will indicate you. Then prepare the eggplant which cannot miss from a real moussaka and the dressing for this amazing recipe. Then arrange everything in the frying-pan and get it into the oven. And this is it! A new recipe to try in your own kitchen. Enjoy this cooking games for girls! If you like this game please Rate it and Share with your friends! This App is FREE and SAFE to USE!!!

This is free, ad-supported version of SolarSystemScope. If you prefer full experience, you can find ad-free PRO version here: https://goo.gl/WpFimj SolarSystemScope 3D simulation of the Solar System and night sky - real time virtual orrery and observatory - Android version of http://www.solarsystemscope.com/ - Requires at least 50 MB of free space on card to open correctly - Languages available: english, spanish, german, russian, italian, korean, slovak Features: - Heliocentric view with real-time positions of planets and planetary orbits - Schematic and realistic sizes of the planets and distances between them - Movement of the planets in time to see how they move in relation to each other - Virtual Orrery  - Planetary exploration with info texts, images and additional views such as structure  - Moons (Galilean moons, Deimos & Phobos, Titan and 15 others) - Dwarf planets (Pluto, Ceres, Haumea, Makemake. Eris) and their orbits - Comets (Siding Spring, Lovejoy 2013, Lovejoy 2011, Panstarrs, ISON, Halley, 67P, 209P) - positions and trajectories - Spacecraft Rosetta and its journey to comet 67P/Churyumov–Gerasimenko - Stars and constellation of the night sky as viewed from a given location - Virtual Observatory - Interactive night sky: point the device at the sky to see all objects in their proper place - Changes in the night sky during night, month and year  - Advanced searching of the objects - Ecliptic line, grid lines and more

description: Anatomy 4 Kids Premium es la versión premium sin publicidad. Es un juego gratis de preguntas para que los niños puedan aprender anatomía humana de forma muy sencilla en inglés y en español. Hay tres niveles de dificultad haciendo preguntas sobre huesos, músculos y órganos del cuerpo. Modos de juego: * Quiz: Preguntas sobre dónde están localizados los órganos y partes del cuerpo, huesos, músculos, órganos como el corazón, aparato digestivo, etc * Aprendizaje: Parecido al modo anterior pero la aplicación no hará preguntas, pulsa en cualquier parte y te dirá como se llama. Este juego educativo de anatomíaestá orientado a niños de primaria y secundaria. Los niños de educación infantil pueden jugar pero su nivel quizá sea demasiado difícil. Si estás en la universidad estudiando medicina puede que esta aplicación sea demasiado sencilla para ti aunque puedes hacer uso del nivel difícil que está preparado para médicos, enfermeros o personas interesadas en aprender más detalles del cuerpo humano. como por ejemplo músculos, huesos, dientes, aparato digestivo, cerebro, etc Válido para niños, niñas y adultos, con nivel desde infantil/primaria/secundaria hasta la universidad. Muy útil para estudiar en los exámen anatomia de los musculos, de los huesos y organos del cuerpo humano Esta aplicación sirve para aprender todos los huesos y músculos del cuerpo de forma muy divertida. Es muy educativa porque además de aprender a decirlo en español se aprende inglés ya que se puede jugar seleccionando como idioma el ingles, de esta forma se aprenden palabras en inglés para que los niños sean bilingües. No es necesario el uso de red wifi ni 3g para usar esta aplicación en tu telefono móvil o tablet HD. Aprende algo para aprobar exámenes de biología / anatomía. Anatomy 4 Kids Premium is the premium version without ads. It's a free quiz game for children to learn human anatomy very easily in English and Spanish. There are three levels of difficulty asking questions about bones, muscles and organs. Game modes: * Quiz: Questions about where they are located the organs and body parts, bones, muscles, organs such as the heart, digestive system, etc. * Learning: Similar to the previous mode but the application does not ask questions, click anywhere and tell you his name. Anatomíaestá This educational game aimed at children from primary and secondary. The preschoolers can play but their level may be too difficult. If you're in college studying medicine this application may be too simple for you but you can make use of difficult level that is ready to doctors, nurses or people interested in learning more details of the human body. such as muscles, bones, teeth, digestive tract, brain, etc. Suitable for children and adults, with level from kindergarten / primary / secondary school to university. Very useful for studying the anatomy examination of the muscles, bones and organs of the human body This application is used to learn all the bones and muscles of the body in a fun way. It is very educational as well as learn to speak in English you learn Spanish because you can play by selecting as the English language, thereby learning words in English for children to be bilingual. Using WiFi or 3G network is not necessary to use this application on your mobile phone or tablet HD. Learn something to pass exams in biology / anatomy.

Photo Card, no more spending money on passport photos! Have you been requested a photo of your child for school, for your ID, driving license or passport? Any friend of yours need passport photos? Take a picture with your android, select type of document (JPEG or PDF), then select the number of photos you need and the size of the paper. Then print your photo card with your printer or e-mail them to a colleague and away you go! Features: - Take a picture or select one from your photo library. - Rescale and crop the picture you just made or selected. You can adjust the brightness of the picture as well. - Select type of document (JPEG or PDF), then select the number of photos you want, image size (depending on country) and choose the paper size of one of the most common formats: Letter, Legal, A3, A4, A5, B4, B5. - You can send it by e-mail and print or open it with any PDF or JPEG viewer app you have installed on your device. - Manage pdf and jpeg files created with photos from the application. - Languages: English, Spanish and Catalan. * Recommendations for use: - Use a white background, eg white wall. - Prints on photo paper to be legally valid. * Images are official size throughout Europe, USA, Canada, Russia, Japan and most countries in South America.

description: Perfect Pint shows you pubs and beer festivals around you and the beers they are serving. With Perfect Pint you can: - Find your favourite beers wherever you go - Stay up to date with what your local is serving - Take advantage of beer and pub discounts around the UK exclusive to Perfect Pint members - Discover new beers similar to the ones you like thanks to our 'Bernard recommends' feature - Check in at pubs to earn achievements, share your experiences with friends and keep a record of the pints you are drinking - Win prizes through our seasonal Beer Bingo competition, including the chance to brew your own beer Perfect Pint is a collaborative effort between UK pubs, breweries and the Perfect Pint community. You too can contribute by joining our troupe of Beer Ambassadors and earn monthly rewards along the way. With over 17,000 pubs and 26,000 beers in our database, each including a description and tasting notes, we hope our app will be a handy companion in your quest to find the Perfect Pint.
release_text: New in v1.74 - added support for 'Can' beer format - added 'Blog' to 3x3 menu - minor bug fixes

description: Sail your icebreaker boat and clear a path to rescue stranded boat, submarines and airplanes. "A Super realistic boat adventure with amazing graphics and game play!" With 3 amazing realistic 3D boats and graphics this family game will test your skills at driving the biggest and most bad ass mega boats found on ice.Will you rescue the people before they freeze? There are 3 gigantic icebreaking ships you get to sail in Icebreaker Boat Rescue Parking ☸ Thor Viking - Just like The real vikings explored the world this boat does it too. it can go anywhere! Thor Viking is one of the toughest ice breaker on water ☸ Kaptain Khle - The biggest ice breaking boat out there. twice the power and size of thor viking and twice the length. If you want range and speed in your rescue mission this icebreaker will get it done! ### Sail your icebreaker boat and clear a path to rescue stranded boat, submarines and airplanes. ### Icebreaker Boat Rescue Parking is an original title Rhino Games Studio. This game fits boat fans and rescue mission game lovers. If you love Jet Ski games, Police Car driving or riptide jet boat games then you are bound to absolutely love this game. It has all the best stuff these game have and more. More challenging the jet ski boat, more crashing and smashing the police games have and is faster then any other rescue game you might know. ### Why are there all these vehicles stranded on the north pole ice caps you might ask? ✘✘ Nuclear submarine - Used for research and spying missions by the US, Russian and other armys ✘✘ Airplanes - Used to transfer supplies to off shore bases used for research ✘✘ Cruise ships and jet boats - Used for recreation and touring of the north pole by hundreds each month ### Icebreaker Boat Rescue Parking race game is Free to download. description: Stop es un nuevo juego de palabras con el que podrás jugar contra tus amigos. Si alguna vez has jugado al Scatergories este juego te encantará. El juego consiste en encontrar palabras que pertenezcan a una categoría y que empiecen por una letra determinada. Ejemplo : Animal con M ->Murciélago. Puedes buscar a tus amigos por su nombre de usuario, hacerles favoritos o comenzar una nueva partida con un oponente aleatorio. Si no encuentras a alguno de tus amigos, puedes recomendarles el juego para que se bajen la aplicación y jugar con ellos. Para jugar a Stop es necesario un sencillo registro en el que deberás elegir un nombre de usuario y una contraseña. También puedes introducir tu email para poder recuperar tu contraseña en el caso de que la olvides pero este campo es opcional. Si no quieres registrarte puedes jugar como usuario invitado y se te asignara un nombre aleatorio. Cada partida tiene 10 rondas en las que se darán a ambos jugadores una serie de categorías y letras con las que tendrán que rellenar el hueco correspondiente. Hay tres tipos de rondas diferentes, por lo que en algunas rondas se darán 6 categorías y una sola letra, en otras se darán 6 letras y una sola categoría, y por último otra ronda en la que se darán 1 letra y 1 categoría, teniendo que rellenar en todas ellas 6 palabras. Si consigues responder las 6 palabras antes de que acaben los 60 segundos, pulsa el botón Stop. Cada palabra acertada valdrá 10 puntos y cada segundo que reste de los 60 iniciales valdrá 1 punto. Los segundos restantes solo se contabilizarán si todas las palabras de la ronda son correctas. Ejemplo: Si un jugador acierta todas las palabras de una ronda en 45 segundos su puntuación será (6 aciertos * 10) + (60 segundos - 45 segundos) = 75 Puntos. Ganará el jugador que más puntos consiga en total al finalizar las 10 rondas. En Stop queremos que las categorías estén lo más completas posibles por lo que si crees que alguna de tus palabras es correcta y ha sido señalizada como incorrecta, puedes enviárnosla pulsando sobre ella. La revisaremos e introduciremos en las bases de datos para que te la de como correcta la próxima vez. Siguenos en Twitter @App_Stop Stop is a new word game that you can play against your friends. If you've ever played this game you will love Scatergories. The game is to find words that belong to a category that start with a certain letter. Example: Animal with M -> bat. Look to friends for their username, make favorites or you start a new game with a random opponent. If you do not find any of your friends, you can recommend the game to the application down and play with them. To play a simple registration Stop where you must choose a username and password is required. You can also enter your email to retrieve your password if you forget it but this field is optional. If you do not want to register you can play as a guest user and you assign a random name. Each game has 10 rounds in which both players will be given a number of categories and letters which you have to fill in the corresponding space. There are three different rounds, so in some rounds six categories and a single letter is given, in other 6 letters and one category will be given, and finally another round in which one letter and one category is given, taking fill in all 6 words. If you manage to answer the 6 words before they kill 60 seconds, press the Stop button. Each correct word will be worth 10 points and each second remaining 60 initial worth 1 point. The remaining seconds will be counted only if all the words are correct round. Example: If a player matches all the words of a round in 45 seconds your score will be (6 hits * 10) + (60 seconds - 45 seconds) = 75 points. The player who gets the most points total at the end of the 10 rounds. In Stop the categories we want to be as complete as possible so if you think some of your words is correct and has been marked as incorrect, you can send it by clicking on it. We will review and introduce in the databases for you to be correct the next time. Follow us on Twitter @ App_Stop

app_name: Dark Souls II PvP Level Calc
description: Dark Souls II PvP Soul Level Calculator * Calculates the Soul Level of the person you killed in PvP * Works for consensual PvP and when invaded * Only applicable in situations where you would actually get souls from killing someone! If you defeat someone in PvP by killing a host or invader (i.e. not in an official Arena) then you get souls proportional to the level of the person you killed. This app lets you work out exactly what Soul Level the person you killed is, based on the total souls before and after you killed them. 1) Before you engage in PvP, type your starting souls in one line 2) After you're done killing the other guy, type your final souls in the other line 3) Press the button and the soul level of the guy you killed will show up below Note 1: If you are invaded randomly (blue or red eye invasion) i.e. PvP is nonconsensual then tick the check box as you receive more souls for killing an random world invader than for a consensual PvP encounter. Note 2: "Starting" and "Final" labels are a bit of a misnomer as you can type your starting souls into either row. It will just work out the difference between the two lines, regardless of whether the top one is the start or the final soul value. That way you can just overtype on alternate rows instead of retyping your final souls into the starting line. PvP SL value taken from this page: http://darksouls2.wikidot.com/pvp-soul-value

Unify all of your data collection and update activities with a single system for everyday geospatial field work. Use TerraFlex to collect or update any kind of data in the field with simple forms that you create. Whether your day includes capturing GIS data, incident reports, emergency management or simple inspections, you can use the same streamlined approach to collect geolocated information. Now you can keep field users focused on getting the job done fast. Keep your whole team in sync. No matter how big or small your project, you can review the data as it is collected in the field. •Hosted in the cloud to push out changes to the team instantly •Stay organized by grouping field assignments and data •Data administration and management is done for you via the cloud •Make use of powerful data update workflows with TerraFlex Advanced Getting up and running with TerraFlex is easy. 1) Sign up to create your account. 2) Sign in to Cloud services. 3) Download the Mobile app and you are all set. ---------------------------------- Note: Trimble TerraFlex is designed for your Android phone. Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
release_text: v3.4 *TerraFlex users can now cache background maps for offline use v3.3 *TerraFlex Mobile is now localized in French, German and Spanish v3.2 *Added support for enhanced conditional rules and straight-line navigation v3.1 *Added support for the Trimble R1 GNSS Receiver v3.0 *Added support for new data update workflow v1.7 *Minor improvements and bug fixes

description: CNT Craigslist App is an officially licensed easy-to-use mobile app for craigslist with advanced features for your android phone. Key features include; • Search an ad up to 4 cities at the same time • Post an ad • Save your searches • Notification of new postings in your saved searches • Save a posting or multiple postings in your favorites list • Share a posting or multiple postings via SMS or email • Reply to the poster via email or phone call • Add images via gallery or camera when posting HOW TO TURN NOTIFICATION ON Step 1 1. Go to main page or Saved Search page. 2. Press menu button of your phone (or press inverted triangle button at the right upper corner). 3. Menu will appear at the bottom of the screen. Press Setting. 4. Pop-up menu will appear on the screen. Select notification options. 5. Press SET when you are done. Step 2 1. Go to Saved Search list. 2. Press and hold a saved search title. 3. Select On Notification from pop-up menu. 4. Repeat step 2 for another saved search title you want to turn notification on.

Connect with your friends using Facebook! FBM for Facebook! This application is an implementation of the Facebook mobile website written into an application to allow advanced features. It uses the official Facebook SDK to provide features such as notifications. Please note this application should be considered an optimized web browser for http://touch.facebook.com - any page you see in this application can be accessed using your default Android browser. The advantage of using an application is that features such as notifications, contact sync and direct photo/video uploads can be integrated directly into the Android operating system. At the moment notifications have been implemented. More features will be added in future updates. Features: • Full Facebook Support • Touch Optimized UI • Check-in (GPS must be enabled) • Upload Photos • Notifications

description: Smart Contraction automatically keeps record of the start/end date and time, contraction duration, and frequency. Tap start timing at the beginning of contraction and tap Stop timing at the end. Tap Report to see summary of contractions records, share report in excel file via email or chat messenger. When it’s time to leave for Hospital Smart Contraction will remind you in every five minutes, to cancel reminder just Tap “Don`t remind” on the reminder dialog. This application is free to use, please post your feedback so I can improve it. Features: • Easy to use interface. • Share your contraction report in excel file via email or chat messenger. • Get “Go to Hospital” notifications when it's time to leave for the hospital. • Records start/end date and time of each contraction. • Records contraction frequency • Records duration of each contraction. • Option to delete a false water break childbirth,labor, pregnant, pregnancy, mimba, labor pains,obstetrics, uchungu wa mimba, birth, delivery, conceive, hospital, clinic,infant, doctor,baby
release_text: 1.Polished user interface 2.Option to Stop phone from re-locking 3.Delete a messed up contraction 4.Edit contraction`s start or stop date and time 5.Add Note to a contraction 6.Add contraction intensity in the pain level of 0 to 10 7.Keep track or records of your body weight (in LBS or KG) 8.Weight graph (Weight Vs time graph) 9.Pregnancy summary, including due date, weeks to go, delivery place etc. 10.Option to Enable/Disable go to Hospital notifications 11.Export weight records in excel

description: OneSim VoIP provides OneSimCard customers with an even less expensive way to make and receive international calls on their OneSimCard-enabled mobile phones. To use OneSim VoIP, users must have a sufficient Wi-Fi or 3G Data connection, Android 2.0 or higher phone and a VoIP-enabled Personal Extra Number (PEN) activated with OneSimCard.com. When making an outgoing call, a OneSimCard user can select the way the call will be made – either through the OneSimCard international SIM card or OneSimCard VoIP network. Calls made over the OneSimCard VoIP network are generally much lower cost than OneSimCard’s standard international roaming rates seen at www.onesimcard.com/rates. Incoming calls made to the PEN will be received through low-cost VoIP if the OneSimCard phone and OneSim VoIP app has a sufficient Wi-Fi network or 3G Data connection. Otherwise, the call will be sent the usual way to the phone through the international SIM card. The OneSim VoIP app does not require the OneSimCard international SIM card to be installed in the phone. The app will not work with a 3G Data connection made through a OneSimCard international SIM card in order to avoid high data usage charges on your OneSimCard account. OneSim VoIP will work only with a 3G Data connection made with a SIM card from another company or when connected through a Wi-Fi network. Initial settings for the app are available in the “My SIM Cards” menu of your OneSimCard.com online account. When in the My SIM Cards menu, select the SIM if there is more than one on your account and then click on the Create VoIP Account link. This will create a OneSim VoIP account and provide you with a link to the settings information for your phone. Important: Connection quality of the calls made using OneSim VoIP option over Wi-Fi or 3G will only be as good as the quality of the Data connection. Please be advised that in most cases this kind of connection quality is inferior to the connection quality made through the OneSimCard international SIM card cell roaming network.

Magyar Alkalmazások egy helyen! Az alábbi alkalmazás segítségével összegyűjtöttük a magyar nyelvű, és magyaroknak hasznos alkalmazásokat egy helyre. Az Android Market kategóriái szerint kereshető alkalmazáslista, amely folyamatosan frissül. A leírásokat nem a Telenor adja, hanem az alkalmazások fejlesztői.

Busan eFM is the first local English radio station established by the City of Busan in order to provide useful living tips and information about local culture to visitors from overseas and expatriates living in the Busan area as well as to help Busan citizens to improve their English ability by expanding opportunities to listen to radio broadcasts in English. Since it launched its English radio service via 90.5MHz on February 27th 2009, Busan eFM Radio has provided not only useful but also entertaining programs covering current affairs, news, entertainment, music, culture and information. Busan eFM's smartphone application will enable you to listen to live broadcasts in real time in the palm of your hand so that you can access a wide range of information including news, weather forecasts, and AODs. Enjoy sophisticated English broadcasts via BeFM's smartphone application in the palm of your hand.

Los que usamos taxis en Bogotá tenemos un problema de saber cuanto nos cuesta la carrera, para eso esta aplicación se encarga de decirle a los usuarios a partir de la cantidad de unidades que tiene cuanto le cuesta. Características Novedosas: - La aplicación tiene en cuenta la fecha y hora para determinar sí es nocturno, domingo o festivo. - El código es open source. https://code.google.com/p/taxicontrol/ - Funciona para todos los celulares y tabletas desde android 1.6 (y algunos 1.5) Those who use taxis in Bogota we have a problem we know how difficult the race for this application that handles users tell from the number of units that how much it costs. Novel features: - The application takes into account the date and time to determine whether it is night, Sunday or holiday. - The code is open source. https://code.google.com/p/taxicontrol/ - Works for all phones and tablets from Android 1.6 (and some 1.5)

description: Яндекс.Навигатор будет показываться автоматически после звонка. При звонке телефон переключается на приложение телефон, и поэтому очень часто приходится обратно вызывать навигатор после завершения звонка. Данное приложение делает это автоматически. Приложение отслеживает, был ли активен Навигатор при звонке, и после него автоматически возвращается в него, делая вашу поездку более комфортной и безопасной! Будем рады отзывам на restart@rphone.ru Yandeks.Navigator will be displayed automatically after the call. When you call the phone switches to the phone app, and therefore often have to call back the navigator after the call. This application does this automatically. The application keeps track of whether the Navigator is active when you call, and after it automatically returns to it, making your trip more comfortable and safe! We will be happy to vote for restart@rphone.ru
release_text: Спасибо за отзывы! Теперь навигатор не запускается, если он выгружен из памяти.

description: 안녕하세요 용사님! 내손안에 메이플, 메이플 핸즈 입니다! 메이플 핸즈가 드디어 2.0으로 새롭게 개선이 되었습니다. 많은 부분들이 개선이 된 만큼 이용에 도움이 될만한 부분들을 적어보았어요! 용사님들 이용에 참고 부탁 드립니다! ==== 메이플 핸즈에서는 다음의 기능을 제공합니다! ==== 1. 온라인 메이플스토리와 연동되는 “몬스터라이프” 2. 온라인 메이플스토리와 연동되는 “메이플톡” 채팅 (1:1, 그룹, 친구, 길드대화 지원) 3. 온라인 메이플스토리의 최신 소식을 가장 빠르게 접할 수 있는 메뉴 ==== 다음의 내용이 메이플 핸즈 2.0을 통해서 개편 되었습니다! ==== 1. 메이플 핸즈의 디자인이 새롭게 개편되었습니다. - 더욱 유저 친화적이고 세련된 디자인과 구성으로 개선하였습니다. - 메인 디자인을 심플하게 변경하여 한눈에 원하는 메뉴를 찾을 수 있게 개편하였습니다. - 캐릭터의 배경을 쓸어 넘기면 배경이 바뀝니다. - 공식 아이콘도 변경이 되었습니다. 메이플 핸즈의 마스코트는 묵직한 예티와 수다쟁이 페페 입니다! 2. 캐릭터 정보확인이 더욱 편리해지고 강화되었습니다. - 메인로비에서 캐릭터를 터치하면 바로 캐릭터 정보를 확인할 수 있습니다. - 캐릭터 정보에서는 스타플래닛 포인트 및 각종 랭킹 정보를 확인하실 수 있습니다. - 메인로비에서 캐릭터 명 옆의 화살표를 터치하면, 빠르게 보유하고 있는 캐릭터가 표시 됩니다. - 캐릭터 정보확인 창에서 이미지 저장, 다른 앱으로 공유하기, 캐릭터 정보보기 기능 등 편의성이 대폭 향상 되었습니다. 3.“메이플톡” 이 새롭게 탄생 했습니다. 많이 사랑해 주실꺼죠? - 친구와 대화기능을 합쳐 새롭게 “메이플톡” 으로 개선이 되었습니다. - 메이플톡 에서는 모든 월드의 친구를 한눈에 친구목록에서 확인이 가능하며, 친구들과 바로 대화를 시작할 수 있습니다. - 수많은 친구들을 보기 좋게 정렬할 수 있습니다. (월드별, 이름별, 레벨별, 접속별) - 자주 대화하는 친구나 대화방은 즐겨찾기에 등록해서 손쉽게 이동할 수 있습니다. - 많은 용사님들이 제안 주셨던 그룹대화, 길드대화, 친구대화, 길드게시판의 기능이 추가 되었으며, 이는 모두 메이플스토리 온라인과도 연동 됩니다. 단, 길드대화 및 친구대화는 반드시 대표캐릭터가 설정이 되어있어야 하며, 대화방에 입장 하였을 때만 대화를 주고 받을 수 있어요! - 메이플 핸즈 2.0만을 위한 새롭고 귀여운 이모티콘이 개발되었습니다. 친구들과의 대화에서 자유롭게 사용해보세요! 4. 메이플 뉴스 메뉴가 새롭게 개선되었습니다. - 용사님들이 많이 사용하시고 제안 주셨던 뉴스 메뉴로 알차게 구성하였습니다. - 공지사항 / 업데이트 / 이벤트 내용을 바로 확인하실 수 있으며, 직접 홈페이지에 방문하시고 싶으실 경우, 모바일웹 메뉴를 통해 이동이 가능해졌습니다. 5. 캐릭터 정보 업데이트, 친구 동기화 관련 많이 궁금하셨죠? - 새로 친구를 맺은 친구는 자동적으로 한 시간마다 갱신이 됩니다. 만약 바로 친구목록에서 확인을 하고 싶으시다면, 설정- 친구동기화를 통해 가능합니다. 단, 수동 친구 동기화는 한 시간에 한번만 하실 수 있습니다. - 캐릭터 정보 업데이트는 하루에 한번, 새벽 시간대에 이루어 집니다. 캐릭터 정보에는 레벨, 아바타(코디) 가 포함이 되어 있습니다. 앞으로도 메이플 핸즈에서는 용사님들의 의견을 소중히 수렴하고 더욱 유익하고 알찬 기능으로 업데이트하고 찾아뵐것을 약속드릴께요. 많은 관심 부탁 드리겠습니다. 감사합니다! 게임 진행 중 궁금하신 내용이 있다면 도움말 및 고객센터를 이용해주세요! - 게임 도움말 게임 화면 오른쪽 아래 톱니바퀴 클릭 > [설정] > [고객지원] > [FAQ] - 게임 고객센터 게임 화면 오른쪽 아래 톱니바퀴 클릭 > [설정] > [고객지원] > [1:1문의하기] ---- 개발자 연락처 : (주)넥슨코리아 경기도 성남시 분당구 판교로 256번길 7 전화: 1588-7701 사업자등록번호: 220-87-17483 통신판매업 신고번호: 제 2013-경기성남-1659 호 통신판매업 신고기관: 성남시 Hello sir warrior! description: Al Giardino di Claudia e Lara è lieto di presentarvi la sua nuova applicazione mobile, attraverso la quale potrete organizzare e completare la vostra visita, oltre a mantenervi sempre aggiornati su tutte le iniziative e promozioni da noi proposte. L'applicazione vi darà la possibilità di beneficiare di alcune features specifiche per dispositivi mobile quali: - Shortcut di chiamata per contattarci telefonicamente - Mappa interattiva interfacciata con il navigatore - Possibilità di ricevere notifiche Push contenenti offerte e news - Elenco di tutte le notifiche push ricevute - Link diretto alla nostra pagina facebook - Link diretto al nostro sito internet At the Garden of Claudia Lara and is happy to present its new mobile application, through which you can organize and complete your visit, as well as keep up to date on all the events and promotions offered by us. The application will give you the chance to benefit from some specific features for mobile devices such as: - Shortcut to call us by phone - Interactive map interface with the browser - Ability to receive push notifications containing offers and news - List of all push notifications received - Direct link to our facebook page - Direct Link to our website

Toutes les éditions de votre journal 20 Minutes, gratuitement, sur votre smartphone et tablette Android ! Retrouvez chaque jour les 15 éditions quotidiennes en version PDF de Bordeaux-Aquitaine, Centre-Est, Centre-Ouest, Grenoble, Lille-Nord, Grand Lyon, Grand Toulouse, Marseille-Provence, Metz-Nancy, Montpellier-Languedoc, Nantes, Nice Côte d’Azur, Paris, Rennes, Strasbourg et l’édition Nationale. L’application 20 Minutes – le journal vous permet de : - Consulter les éditions du jour - Accéder aux archives des éditions du mois - Etre informé dès la mise en ligne de votre journal - NOUVEAU : Accéder à des contenus enrichis vidéos directement depuis son journal Nous vous recommandons de télécharger votre édition de préférence en Wifi et surtout de vous abonner aux push pour être prévenu en premier de la disponibilité du journal, la veille de la parution. All editions of your newspaper 20 Minutes, for free on your Android smartphone and tablet! Every day, 15 daily editions in PDF Bordeaux-Aquitaine, Central East, Central West, Grenoble, Lille-Nord, Grand Lyon, Grand Toulouse, Marseille-Provence, Metz-Nancy, Montpellier Languedoc, Nantes, Nice Côte d'Azur, Paris, Rennes, Strasbourg and the National edition. The application 20 Minutes - the newspaper allows you to: - Consult editions of the day - Access archives of editions of the month - Be informed when your online newspaper - NEW: Access to rich video content directly from his diary We recommend you to download your edition preferably WiFi and especially to subscribe to push to be notified first on the availability of the newspaper the day before publication.
release_text: Votre journal 20 Minutes est en vacances et sera de retour le 28 août , pensez à accepter les push notifications de l'app pour ne pas rater la prochaine édition. En attendant vous pouvez suivre toute l'actualité en direct sur l'application "20 Minutes". Bonnes vacances à tous !

app_name: IF MY HEART HAD WINGS Ltd. Ed.
description: ■ Story Set in Kazegaura, a suburb in Japan, just outside of Tokyo, 'If My Heart Had Wings' is an animated visual novel bringing forth a passionate, youthful and dream filled high school life story. Aoi Minase returns with shattered dreams to his wind-swept hometown of Kazegaura. There, atop a hill lined with windmills, he encounters a wheelchair-bound girl, Kotori Habane, and a beautiful, white glider soaring through the sky. Together, they decide to revive their school's defunct Soaring Club in order to ride the "Morning Glory", a phantom cloud carried on the wind that blows across Kazegaura. This is a tale of youth, a tale of boys and girls who loved the sky. ■ New feature ★ You can play the continuation of the current mobile version. We will keep you updated with the following stories. ★ You won't have to use Wings anymore to read. You can now freely read all the current scenarios. ★ Offline play Once you download all the required data, you can play the game offline. It is not necessary to download everything beforehand, you can download while playing, but we recommend that you download everything for a comfortable gameplay. ★ Comment posting function This new function allows you to post comments on a current scene. You can then share your review about moving or funny stories with all the players. This function can be enable/disabled, so if you want to concentrate on the scenario, just disable it. If you want to share your thoughts with others, enable it. ★ Skip function If you want to replay the game, you will be able to skip scenes that you've already played. ■ Basic Information - Free-To-Play - Currently with the same gameplay scope as the early of the PC version. - Ability to start the game from where you left off previously.(Auto-continue function in place.) - Optional save and load functions ■ Additional content - Alarm functions- The main character Kotori will speak at the set time. (Exclusive alarm voice included.) - News and updates for the app will be delivered by Kotori. (Exclusive notification voice included.) ■ Addition of sounds - Exclusive system sounds for brand logo, title call, save and load functions - Exclusive rare voice-overs for alarm and error notifications. Over 30 different voice-overs were recorded specially for this. ■ Special features - Addition of images, homepage, and magazine-like visuals in the game. (non-existent in the PC version.) ■ Game system - Equipped with important visual novel functions- i.e. auto-play and backlog functions. - Settings such as volume control, text/auto-play speed and window transparency can be set by the user. - Ability to turn off movie effects for better performance on slower devices. ■ Homepage for the application http://media-c3.co.jp/Application/IMH/ ■ MoeNovel Official homepage: http://www.moenovel.com/imh Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Moenovel?fref=ts Twitter: https://twitter.com/Moenovel --------------------------------------------

Power Pool Mania, Be the Master of Pocket Billiards Competition, the Top Arena Game of Sports and Board! And now it's free! 5 Stages with more than 120 Levels, Special Power up balls, Experience the fun to be a Master in Power Pool Mania! How to Play: - Drag Pool Cue to Adjust Cue Angle. - Press Button to Adjust Cue Angle Slightly. - Drag Energy Button to Adjust Power, Release to Shoot. - Pocket all balls on table to win the level. Game Features: ◆ Completely Suitable for both Casual and Serious Gamers: The simple Drag and Play interface allows you to pick up and play the game quickly, The Cue Ball Controller allowing you to perform more advanced shots including Back Spin, Top Spin, Left Spin and Right Spin. ◆ Various gameplay modes: - Challenges Mode， Time limited for this mode - Free Play Mode， Cues number limited for this mode ◆ 5 Special Stages with Various Tables and More than 120 Levels: - Stage 1：Classic Pool - Stage 2：Master Pool - Stage 3：Blast Pool - Stage 4：Power Pool - Stage 5：Super Pool ◆ Ordinary Balls - Cue ball - Don't sink it! - Red ball - 100 Points - Yellow ball - 150 Points - Black ball - 200 Points ◆ Power up balls： - Bomb Ball - Explodes when Time's up - Fission Ball - Turns to three new red balls When hit by Cue ball - Suck Ball - Sucks in all balls it touches - Fire Ball - Destroys any other balls it touches - Backhole Ball - Turns into a back hole When hit by Cue ball - Pinball Ball - Turns into a pinball bumper When hit by Cue ball ◆ Watch out the Various Traps! Go and have a challenge! wiki infor: Pool, also more formally known as pocket billiards or pool billiards, is the family of cue sports and games played on a pool table having six receptacles called pockets along the rails, a wide variety of games of skill generally played with a cue stick which is used to strike billiard balls. There are three major subdivisions of games within cue sports: Carom billiards, including balkline and straight rail, cushion caroms, three-cushion billiards, artistic billiards and four-ball; Pool, including among others eight-ball, nine-ball, ten-ball, straight pool, one-pocket and bank pool; Snooker and English billiards.

매일 10분씩 투자해 당신의 기억력과 계산 능력을 향상 시켜 보세요. 이 어플리케이션은 간단하게 구구단을 맞추는 기억력 향상 게임입니다. [구구단 연습] 초급 중급 고급으로 나눠줘 있으며, 다음 레벨로 가기 위해서는 이전 레벨을 통과해야만 합니다. 총 3개의 레벨로 구성되며, 각 레벨별로 통과해야 하는 단수는 다음과 같습니다. 초급: 2 ~ 9단 중급: 12 ~ 19단 고급: 22 ~ 29단 [구구단 게임] 초급 중급 고급 3개의 레벨로 게임을 플레이 할 수 있습니다. 총 8문제가 레벨별로 랜덤하게 출제 됩니다. 초급: 2 ~ 9단 중급: 12 ~ 19단 고급: 22 ~ 29단 만든이 : 변두리 프로그래머 For 10 minutes each day to your investment to enhance your memory and computing power.
