[Multiplication practice; Beginner Intermediate Advanced to be handed out, and go to the next level in order to pass the level you must previously. Consists of a total of three levels, each level must be passed by the singular include the following: Novice: 2-9 Intermediate: 12-19 Advanced: 22-29 [Multiplication game] Beginner Intermediate Advanced 3 levels, you can play the game. A total of 08 questions randomly for each level will be a problem. Novice: 2-9 Intermediate: 12-19 Advanced: 22-29 Created by: outside programmers

◆ KAMBU Hangul Games Opening Event – Buy the complete set and receive 20% discount ($5.94->4.99) ◆ 　 ◆ Our friend KAMBU has returned as Hangul teacher. ◆ Master your child's Hangul with KAMBU Hangul Games. ◆ Hangul is taught systematically through repeated lessons on ㄱ~ㅎ,가~하,아에이오우. ◆ Easy vocabulary lessons with matching word and picture. ◆ Universal app : can be used both in Phone and Pad with a single purchase. 　 ◆ App inquiry : for payment error and problems pertaining to app ( helpdesk@bluepin.co.kr ) ◆◆Notice from Bluepin◆◆ 　 Greetings! As the manager of Bluepin, I’d like to take this opportunity to thank everyone who has shown interest and support to our apps. Usually, customers post their inquiries regarding app usage in a form of a review, and our only means of responding to such an inquiry was replying to those review. However, due to technical problems in posting our responses or delay, customer support was not provided in a timely manner. To better serve our customers, we have opened the Bluepin Customer Support Center to process our customer inquiries as quickly and efficiently as possible. Please contact helpdesk@bluepin.co.kr for inquiries and problems pertaining to apps. When contacting customer support, please read the following for quicker response to your inquiry. 　 (1) Contacting customer support by phone -To send an inquiry from your device, go to your phone app’s info and select helpdesk@bluepin.co.kr . (2) Contacting customer support by internet - For online inquiry, please include store of purchase, name of purchased app, device in use, and the OS version for faster response. 　 Thank you.

RPG 'The Conqueror of Dungeons' is very Exciting. You explore mystery dungeons. There are various monsters and traps in dungeons, and they obstruct the challenger. You search for all dungeons, and can you become to a world conqueror? Tablets support. The Extra dungeon delivery start that only the person who cleared all dungeon can begin. It is available from downloading of the game main menu. ■To summon monsters You can capture monsters by meeting a certain condition when you meet them. If you call monsters in dungeons, you will be able to use various special ability. ■You can make your own dungeons. You will be able to make your own dungeons when you push forward a game. You can show your dungeons to many other players. In addition, you can get various treasure by clearing dungeons of other players. ■Strengthening of weapons and armors You can strengthen a weapon, a protective gear. As for the weapon, offensive ability increases. As for the protective gear, defences increase. A weapon, a protective gear has a reinforcement limit and can't strengthen it across a limit.
release_text: ver1.4 We fixed bugs at purchasing items. Tablets support. Textlayout adjusted. Some bugs fixed. Put on link to 'GooglePlay'.

description: **Dawn of Champions Now Available!** Take on the role of a powerful Champions aligned with one of the four factions found within the world of Vigil – Dhartha, Nairi, Sadranis, and Kor. Experience the new Rally game mechanic, andnew multifaction Monsters and Constructs to defeat or use in order to gain victory! (If you are experiencing any connectivity issues with the game, please uninstall and reinstall on your device. You will not lose any purchased content, and a fresh install should help you play without any issues.) 2011 Golden Geek award winner (Best Mobile/Handheld Game) Pocket Gamer Bronze Award 2011 Dice Tower Awards Awards: Best Digital Boardgame iOS Boardgames Blog iOS Board Game of the Year -2011 iPad Boardgame of the Year - 2011 Best Interface and Graphic Design - 2011 Best Online Multiplayer - 2011 Ascension: Chronicle of the Godslayer, was the first officially licensed deck building card game for iOS, and is now available for Android devices! Play alone or with friends to battle against the Fallen One for honor and victory. Conceived and designed by three Magic: the Gathering tournament champions, Ascension will provide hours of engaging and strategic game play for enthusiast and experienced gamers alike. Highlights • Over 50 beautifully detailed cards, hand drawn by Eric Sabee. • Full asynchronous support for multiplayer online games • Play against multiple A.I. opponents using varied strategies. • Introductory tutorial to teach you how to play. Find us on Facebook and Twitter! Playdek website: www.playdekgames.com From Playdek, the award-winning iOS publisher and developer: • D&D Lords of Waterdeep • Agricola(Golden Geek, 2013 – Boardgamegeek.com) • Summoner Wars • Nightfall • Tanto Cuore • Food Fight iOS • Penny Arcade The Game: Gamers vs Evil • Fluxx • Can’t Stop
release_text: Added a new digital only expansion - Promo Pack 5 - which introduces Portal cards to the Center Deck and several faction cards that interact with the Portals.

description: TrafficoAutostrade lets you know everything about the traffic situation on the italian motorways and ringroads in real time. Traffic congestion, car accidents, delays, closed exits and road works, everything you will need for a safe trip right here on your smartphone. All the news are translated in ENGLISH language! Choose your motorway or ringroad and every time you will open the app you will see all the related news! FREE version. Do you want to remove the ads from the app? Download TrafficoAutostrade PRO from PlayStore! Our team wishes you a nice trip! Motorways and Ringroads A1 (Milano - Napoli) A3 (Napoli - Reggio Calabria) A4 (Torino - Trieste) A5 (Torino - Monte Bianco) A6 (Torino - Savona) A7 (Milano - Genova) A8 (Milano - Varese) A9 (Lainate - Chiasso) A10 (Genova - Ventimiglia) A11 (Firenze - Pisa Nord) A12 (Genova - Roma) A13 (Bologna - Padova) A14 (Bologna - Taranto) A15 (Parma - La Spezia) A16 (Napoli - Canosa) A18 (Messina - Rosolini) A19 (Palermo - Catania) A20 (Messina - Palermo) A21 (Torino - Brescia) A22 (Brennero - Modena) A23 (Palmanova - Tarvisio) A24 (Roma - Teramo) A25 (Torano - Chieti - Pescara) A26 (Voltri - Gravellona Toce) A27 (Mestre - Belluno) A28 (Portogruaro - Conegliano) A29 (Palermo - Mazara del Vallo) A30 (Caserta - Salerno) A31 (Albettone - Piovene Rocchette) A32 (Torino - Bardonecchia) A33 (Asti - Cuneo) A34 (Villesse - Gorizia) A35 (Brescia - Milano) A50 (Tangenziale Ovest Milano) A51 (Tangenziale Est Milano) A52 (Tangenziale Nord Milano) A54 (Tangenziale Pavia) A55 (Tangenziale Torino) A56 (Tangenziale Napoli) A57 (Tangenziale Mestre) A58 (Tangenziale Est Esterna Milano) GRA (Grande Raccordo Anulare Roma) RA1 (Tangenziale Bologna) For any questions or problems please write to trafficoautostrade@makeitapp.eu We will be happy to hear from you!
release_text: Now you can leave your own reports about the traffic problem. Help the other users to be informed in real time about the traffic situation. The other users will help you!!

description: In this game with fantastic car physics you will be able to drive taxi in 9 different missions: • Taxi driver - drive passengers around the city • Taxi parking - park your taxi • Taxi jump - jump with taxi over the buildings, bridges, ramps and boats • City - drive passengers through heavy city traffic • Highway - hit the highway avoiding traffic (3-lane game) • Drift - few drifting levels where you need to use handbrake • Supercharged - drive taxi with tuned and powerful engine • Passenger scream - sit on passenger seat and watch drive from it's view • Find way out - use your intelligence to escape from factory yard This game is available in 2 versions: • Lite (free, total download size 42 MB, 17 levels) • Full (paid, no ads, total download size 42 MB, 51 levels) Advantages: • Beautiful city scenarios • Simple but colorful and fast graphics rendering • Great sound • No extra permissions needed for installation • Easy quit from game • Freedom mode for every level Features: • Unity 3D engine • NVIDIA® PhysX® physics engine • Support for both OpenGL 1.x and OpenGL 2.0 • Available for Android 2.0.1 Eclair (API level 6) or higher • Possibility to configure difficulty level: easy, medium, hard • Possibility to configure way to control your vehicle: by touch, by slider, by using wheel and by tilt screen • Possibility to reduce visibility range, to increase frame rate on low-end devices • Possibility to change camera during game (in car, follow car, rotate cam, dynamic and static) • Supports all screen sizes from e.g. Samsung Galaxy Mini (480x320) to Samsung Galaxy S3 or Huawei Tablets Notes: • Use this LITE version to check Duty Driver Taxi LITE performance, before downloading full version! • You need better Android device to run this game. If you have low-end device and game works to slow, even after reducing visibility range and turning off fog and other effects, please don't rate this game with 1 star. Just get faster Android. • This is a LITE version. It has 17 levels. If you want to play full game with 51 levels, search for Duty Driver Taxi FULL at Google Play. • Vehicle traffic use simple physics model in order to work on mobile devices • Screenshots are both from lite and full version of Duty Driver Taxi and lite version doesn't include all scenes visible in screenshots • On some devices visibility range, model details and textures might different, depending of device that you are using • In case of bad performance, reduce visibility range in OPTIONS/GRAPHICS to 150 meters and turn the fog OFF • If you will like this game, check occasionally Google Play for new versions of Duty Driver • Internet access is used to show advertisements • Email us your experience with this game: ideas for new episodes of Duty Driver, what you don't like and what kind of missions did you like the best Enjoy the game! P.S. If you have low-end device, and game works slow or it doesn't work at all, please don't rate game with 1 star. It is impossible to make a demanding 3D game that will work on all Android devices. Rate the game only if you can play it. If you have problems with downloading or installing this game, restart your mobile phone. Try download both via WiiFii and mobile internet.
release_text: Version 1.2 -added 4 more cars in FREEDOM mode with faster speed -improved freedom mode -added SIMULATION MODE (1st person camera, no damage allowed) -added RANDOM which opens random level with random car in freedom mode -improved traffic cars -changing sky Version 1.1 -fixed bugs in parking, supercharged and city mission -changed icon -slower traffic -faster orbit camera

description: The Ducks Unlimited Membership app is a virtual membership card exclusive to DU members. Now you can carry a digital version of your card everywhere you go conveniently on your Android phone! Not a Ducks Unlimited member? No problem. Simply download this app and follow the links to join online today. The app displays the following information as shown on your printed card: · DU member ID number · Membership level · Contact information · Membership expiration date (if applicable) Additionally, the app will remind you when it’s time to renew your membership and provides two options that will allow you to renew: 1. A list of DU events across the nation can be found in the app. By attending a DU event, you can automatically renew your membership. 2. A direct link is provided within the app that will allow you to immediately renew your membership with a credit card payment. Finally, the app includes a bar code which can be scanned at the door at future Ducks Unlimited events. This FREE app is a must for all Ducks Unlimited members!

In this math game, challenge the Professor, defeat his machine with the speed of your thinking and your mental mathematics skills! Compete against other players in battles of calculation! ★ Multiplayer mode to play against other players locally or online ★ 75 levels of play to challenge professor Barberac ★ 5 difficulty levels: school, student, graduate, professor and genius ★ With Google Play Game Service, over 90 achievements to unlock, 6 different rankings to share and save your progress with Cloud Save ★ A math game that increase your mental math skills ★ Graphic content calculated and optimized for each screen definition (SD,HD,4K,..) ★ Available in English, French, Spanish, Catalan, Portuguese, Italian, German, Dutch, Russian, Japanese, Korean and Chinese ★ In-app purchase for the Premium Access (removal of advertising and additional options) Information about permissions: ⬩ Writing to the external storage device: to store generated files
Splendid waves are rolling on the beach during this beautiful relaxing midnight. You can climb in the boat and look at the wonderful blue moon hiding in the ocean.

Salesforce1 is a brand new way to experience Salesforce from any device and brings all your Chatter, CRM, custom apps, and business processes together in a unified, modern experience for any Salesforce user. With the power of the Salesforce1 Platform, you can now customize and build any app and instantly deploy that functionality through the Salesforce1 app. Now you can experience all of Salesforce on your mobile device with the new Salesforce1 Mobile App: • Create custom Publisher actions to take action from anywhere • Receive notifications for posts and approvals that need your attention • Access your custom list views • Get an immediate view of your day in the new "Today" app • View a brand new user interface for records, people, and groups • Choose from a variety of mobile-optimized AppExchange apps to install • Access all your custom objects and apps through the navigation menu • Bring Visualforce pages and components into the navigation menu and onto records Early access to beta builds: For early access to beta versions of the app before they are made generally available, you can sign up for access to the beta here: https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.salesforce.chatter Note: The latest version of Salesforce1 requires devices with Android OS 4.4 (KitKat) or later.
release_text: What’s new in 8.0: • Updated to the latest Lighting Experience look and feel • Android for Work Policies (Certificate Based Authentication)

description: Travel around the world and partake in the most fascinating holidays and festivals celebrated in different countries! Bon Voyage: Hidden Object Game makes hunting for hidden objects more exciting than ever. Take a grand tour around four continents. Learn incredible facts about the history and origin of the most popular holidays. Gather impressive collections of artifacts and national symbols, which are a mandatory attribute of ancient and modern cultural traditions of humanity. Good luck on your adventure! Features Bon Voyage: Hidden Object Game: ● Get precious collections of cultural artifacts ● Enjoy 3 different hidden object game modes ● Make your way through 90 spectacular locations of hidden objects ● Thousands of hidden objects! ● 5 languages available: English, French, Spanish, German and Russian Encyclopedia of adventures. There are many incredible and captivating holidays in the furthest corners of the Earth you may not know about. Bon Voyage: Hidden Object Game is your chance to get acquainted with cultural and religious phenomena of mankind. In this all-new hidden object adventure you'll witness the beauty of Cherry Blossom in Japan, experience the main events of Scottish Highland games, visit the southeastern cities of Rio de Janeiro to participate in Carnival. Bon Voyage: Hidden Object comprises of 4 level packs. Visit picturesque places of North and South America, Europe and Asia. Every location of hidden objects is devoted to a famous event accompanied by encyclopedic articles which can help you to learn interesting facts and expand your horizons. The game is available in four languages, so it will be interesting to play in word associations and improve your vocabulary of a preferred language. There are 3 modes of difficulty: find hidden objects from the list, look at the silhouette shapes and find items in the picture, enjoy hidden object search by word associations. In order to proceed to the next chapter you need to get a unique collection of artifacts corresponding to the event. Earn various bonuses and see how high you can score in the global leader board. Excellent graphics and music create a festive mood and ignite the spirit of adventure. Bon Voyage!

Find amazing life-like items in different rooms of a mysterious suburban house. Complete each scene by - PICTURE - WORD - SILHOUETTE - MEMORY 3 difficulty levels to chose from. - CASUAL - No time limit and quick hint. All modes available for each unlocked level! - NORMAL - Time limit and slower hint. Each use of hint costs 2 seconds. Only those modes you've played in the previous level are available in the next one. - EXPERT - Bonus mode for those who got all stars on all levels in either CASUAL or NORMAL mode. Complete each scene to get three stars! Go back to previous levels to get a better score and unlock the next section! Features: - Clever fun to solve hidden object scenes - Item search by word,picture or silhouette - Inspiring artwork in realistic locations - Difficulty levels and unlockable content - Search object by names, pictures, silhouettes and more - Rating system - go back to previous levels to get a better score; - Find up to 6 memorized objects in special levels; - Pass through wonderful bonus modes - 2048 and Memory! *Powered by Dolby Audio on enabled devices

app_name: Yahoo新聞- 即時多元、全台參與
description: Yahoo新聞APP全新瀏覽介面，滿足滑世代閱讀新聞3大需求：彙整多元觀點、參與、快速。圖文影音完整呈現、網友最愛心情新聞帶著走，Yahoo新聞讓你隨時隨地掌握最新消息和熱門話題。 主要功能： • 編輯精選焦點新聞 - Yahoo編輯精選焦點新聞，匯集數十家各大媒體的觀點，輕鬆掌握每日新聞重點。 • 留言回應功能 - 讓你可以在閱讀新聞同時表達意見，也了解網友對於新聞的觀點。 • Yahoo民調中心 - 針對各種議題，投票立即表達你的立場，全民心聲都在Yahoo民調中心。 • 影音直播互動聊天 - 不定期舉辦影音直播活動，線上與來賓互動問答。 • 心情新聞 - 心情新聞排行榜告訴你所有網友的感受。 • 新聞快訊與推播通知 - 重大新聞一發生，Yahoo新聞編輯立刻推播訊息告知，讓你永遠掌握第一手消息。 • 客製化的分類設定 - Yahoo新聞APP以你為尊，依照喜好輕鬆調整分類順序，一打開就看到你最想看的新聞。 主要功能： • 更多其他功能 - 完整的新聞類別 - 隨時分享新聞內容到 Facebook, Line, Tumblr - 字型大小設定
release_text: 本次版本 - 新增影音直播及群組聊天室功能 - 細部優化提高穩定度

description: The application "Local weather USA" gives us the overview of weather data for about 25000 towns from the United States of America.There is current weather information, as well as a weakly weather forcast. Forecast for the upcoming 3 days is very detailed. The application gives us data about temperature, humidity, speed and direction of wind. We can choose between different units. There are °F and °C for temperature and mph and km/h for wind speed. Locations we are interested in can be added as bookmarks. Aplication gets data from OpenWeatherMap.
Para que los más pequeños de la casa aprendan los números en inglés. También útil para los principiantes. For the little kids learn numbers in English. Also useful for beginners.

Warning: Driving in the wrong lane is risky. Only, the most experienced or insane drivers to go beyond this point. Enjoy driving in the wrong lane but how many laps can you go before you get burnt to the ground. Have fun with this fast paced game of driving in the wrong lane. Keep your eyes on the road and move through the oncoming traffic that changes lanes without notice. Exciting Game Features: * Never Ending Fun * Easy Car Control * Great Graphics * Addictive Game Play * Easy to understand but difficult to Master Thanks!! If you have any feedbacks to share, please be free to write in directly to karan@mobieos.com and I will personally get back to you.

The best aim and shoot bubble style game.Welcome to the classic and exciting Bubble Shooter game. How to play - Just tap on the game board where you specifically want the ball to hit. Knock the bubbles down by forming clusters of three or more bubbles.Your goal is to clear all the bubbles before they overflow the bottom line * Available in 2 mode classic and arcade. * 100's of level to clear * Addictive game * In Arcade mode clear all the descending bubbles. * In classic puzzle mode use the limited bubbles to clear all the bubbles on the screen. Enjoy the bubble game, shoot and earn points by bubble blast !!!

Free expense manager app for exepense tracking and cost management. Keep your finances in check by complete cost transparency and cost control. Easily and quickly create a personal financial plan or a budget for the entire household. Track your expenses in the integrated expense manager. Analyze your expenses in the expense calculator and check your budget compliance. Planning of monthly or yearly budget - Fast creation of a budget plan with categories and entries - Differentiation between fixed and variable expenses for simplification of expenses monitoring - Balance analysis and budget partitioning - Evaluation of budget plan in a configurable pie chart Monitoring of monthly or yearly expenses - Fast entry of expenses by using an optimized dialog - Evaluation of expenses per category in a configurable bar chart - Evaluation of expenses over time in a configurable bar chart Controlling of monthly or yearly budget compliance - Analysis of available budget and budget compliance - Evaluation of budget compliance per category in a configurable bar chart - Evaluation of budget compliance over time in a configurable bar chart Forecast for the development of savings - Analysis of future savings according to budget plan - Evaluation of savings development over time in a configurable bar chart More Features: - Password protection - Currency selection - Dataexport to CSV / Excel
release_text: Current update: - Design optimization - Simplification of input dialogs - Optimization of chart UI Next updates: - Statistics - More translations

description: Summer Beach Live Wallpaper make you feel like you are in real beach in the tropical southern island. A white beach parasol wave slowly in the cool sea breeze and some sailboats are also sailing in the breeze on the ocean.If you touch the screen, the reflective blaze of the sun(lens flare) will appear! Enjoy the contrast between 'white' of beach parasol and beautiful ocean 'emerald green'. Go to menu -> wallpaper -> live wallpaper to view this wallpaper.

Simple GPS toggle widget(1x1). IMPORTANT: widget may not work on some android versions, since GPS api is closed. If you use your device for navigation, make sure you can see gps icon in notifications while you use your navigation app. You can doable check if GPS is ON by clicking on widget label, it will bring android gps settings screen. Allows you On/Off your GPS state with only 1 click instead of 4. To add widget press: Home->Menu->Add->Widgets->GPS OnOff HINT: tap on widget label will take you to system settings. Look for our AppControl application manager and ProcessManager.

description: New innovative cube-matching game comes! Multiple game goals, time mode, score mode, collection mode. Challenge yourself to get the Big Heart Cube landed! How to Play: • Place cubes to create groups of three or more • Try to make the Big Cube reach the bottom • Make the Big Cube touch as many as star cubes to earn extra moves Features: • 256 interesting levels • Small size but super fun • Create a high score in your friends circle Check out this unique game on your phone, and have fun playing!
release_text: Version 1.5.061 - Crash bug fixes - Reduce the difficulty of the game

description: El temps és una aplicació no oficial, que mostra la informació meteorològica de Catalunya. EL TEMPS Mostra la informació del temps del lloc escollit, indicant temperatura, humitat, precipitacions, pressió atmosfèrica i la direcció i força del vent. LA PREDICCIÓ PER HORES Mostra les prediccions d'avui i demà, detallant l'estat del temps d'hora en hora, indicant la temperatura i la direcció i força del vent. LA PREDICCIÓ PER DIES Mostra la preddiciccions dels propers nou dies detallant l'estat del cel, temperatures màximes i mínimes així com la humitat. LA PREDICCIÓ DE CATALUNYA Mostra un mapa de catalunya amb la predicció comarca a comarca indicant amb símbols climàtics l'estat del cel i la precipitació prevista El mapa permet mostrar l'estat del cel d'avui i demà. EL RADAR Mostra el mapa de Catalunya amb el radar de plujes i llamps actuals. Permet veure una animació amb els desplaçaments de les plujes de 6 en 6 minuts. DADES EMA Mostra el llistat de poblacions amb les temperatures màximes, mínimes, força del vent i precipitació acumulada. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ NOTA Des de que el Servei Català de Meteorologia ha canviat el format de les dades obertes que fins ara utilitzavem, la aplicació "El Temps" que haviem creat i de la qual estavem tant satisfets, ha deixat de funcionar, de manera que ens hem vistos obligats a renovar la app i accedir directament al portal web del Meteocat Tanmateix, hem desenvolupat una eina cómoda i pràctica per a consultar les dades del temps mitjançant una aplicació rápida i eficient. Les pàgines web del portal del Meteocat, inclouen publicitat de la qual nosaltres no en rebem cap retribuició. Moltes gràcies a tots. Time is not an official application that displays weather information of Catalonia. TIME  Show the information of the site chosen, indicating temperature, humidity, precipitation, atmospheric pressure and wind speed and direction. THE PREDICTION FOR HOURS Show predictions for today and tomorrow, detailing the weather early in time, indicating the temperature and the direction and strength of the wind. PREDICTION FOR THE DAY See preddiciccions the next nine days detailing the state of the sky, maximum and minimum temperatures and humidity. PREDICTION OF THE CATALAN View a map of the Catalonia region to region forecast weather symbols indicating the state of the sky and precipitation forecast The map can display the state of the sky today and tomorrow. RADAR View map of Catalonia rain radar and lightning current. Lets see an animation of the movement of the rain 6 in 6 minutes. DATA AWS Show list of cities with the maximum temperature, minimum wind speed and rainfall. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ NOTE Since the Catalan Meteorological Service has changed the format of open data that we used to date, the application "Weather" which had created and they were both satisfied, stopped working, so we obliged viewed renew the app and go directly to the website Meteocat However, we have developed a convenient and practical tool for viewing weather data through an application quickly and efficiently. The web portal of Meteocat include advertising which we do not receive any retribuició. Thank you all.

description: Swipe your finger to send the Ball flying in a direction you want, it's easy to learn and challenging to master. Feels like playing Real Table Tennis! - International Table Tennis League - 20 Unique Players to Challenge - Career Mode - Online Multiplayer - Realistic Table Tennis Physics - Beautiful 3D Graphics - Leaderboards Swipe your finger in a direction you want the Ball to go. Timing your swipe is critical for a fast shot that is hard to return. Starting your swipe too early or late will send a slow shot to your opponent which is easy to return. So start your swipe when the ball is in a perfect position for a fast and precise shot. Have Fun!
release_text: - No More Multiplayer Errors We have completely rebuilt the multiplayer, and switched the provider so that the multiplayer should be a lot more stabile with no more down period.

description: What's gonna be my future house? Yes, you can have a nice house someday--!! what’s gonna be your future house? "At least six bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, walk-in closets” “big windows and a huge balcony, with comfortable furnitures.” “Plenty of space even in a single room” This application gives you joy when you hanging out with friends. We all know that a name can tell a lot about a person. All names are have a meaning. "My future house -just for fun" can predict your future house by your name. Even if the result is not good, you don't have to change your name. ;-) * How to use 1. Enter your name 2. Press Confirm button and wait for seconds. 3. Enjoy your result(if you want, go out to buy your future car) 4. Share the result with your SNS friends(Facebook, Twitter) Based on scientific principles and the actual statistics! We are better than Nostradamus! But remember this, these are just for fun! Enjoy it!

*** This is the ONLY APP on the Google Play Store which will allow REBOOT into FLASHMODE for supported Xperia device! *** [*] PLEASE READ THE FULL INFO BELOW BEFORE INSTALLING APP! [*] *** ROOTED DEVICE REQUIRED! *** *** Reboot in FlashMode will work only on Xperia devices released after August, 2012! *** (Read Note #1) This app also features a much more stable (android system based) Power Off feature! So data loss will be minimized! As an added safety feature I have taken special care to make sure that the device syncs data to filesystem before any reboot is called through the app! Other than that special feature this app also supports reboot features like: >> Reboot Device >> Recovery - that works for Xperia devices! (Read Note #2) >> Fastboot/Bootloader (Read Note #3) >> Download Mode - only for Samsung devices (Read Note #4) >> Power Off If you are using a device with my latest DooMKernel (Feb 1, 2014 onwards) then you will see multi-recovery options! >> CWM Recovery >> TWRP Recovery >> PhilZ Touch Recovery Notes: 1) For flashmode - Only works on Xperia phone manufactured after August 2012! This mode will only show up when the device is connected to PC and if the correct drivers are installed on PC! 2) For the Reboot into Recovery feature to work the device MUST HAVE WORKING RECOVERY (CWM or TWRP) with recovery handlers which can recognize the reboot into recovery tag! 3) For fastboot/bootloader mode - the device should be support that mode! This mode will only show up when the device is connected to PC and if the correct drivers are installed on PC! 4) For download mode - the device should be support that mode! Only supported on Samsung devices! This mode will only show up when the device is connected to PC and if the correct drivers are installed on PC!
release_text: v3.0 - added support for KitKat! now supports Xperia Z2, Z2 Tablet, Z1 Compact, T2 Ultra, E1 v2.0 - support multi-recoveries exclusively on devices with latest DooMKernel (post Feb 1, 2014) v1.0 - initial release

description: Smart Ring Controller sets the ringer volume according to the ambient noise when an incoming call is received. If the silent mode or the vibrate mode is enabled Smart Ring Controller does not change the volume. Smart Ring Controller also ... controls the vibration (pocket mode). ... handles notifications. ... reads out notifications and caller names. (e.g. with a wired headset) ... supports a "flip for silence" gesture. ... decreases the ringer sound on shake and when the phone is unpacked.
release_text: version 2.1: Add an increasing ringer volume setting. Limit the volume if a wired headset is connected version 2.0: Show the estimated ringer volume directly on the settings page. version 1.9: new ringer volume settings page version 1.8: show a notification when the phone is in silent mode bug fixes

description: Fun Puzzle Game. Help the caterpillar to become a beautiful butterfly. Levels get tougher as you clear the levels. An addicting game inspired from the classic rush hour game, the original sliding block Traffic Jam puzzle. The goal is to get the caterpillar out of the board by sliding the other blocks out of the way. MAIN FEATURES: + Four difficulty levels – easy, medium, hard, expert + Measures your score against your Personal Best and the Perfect Score + Keeps history of "Solved" and "Perfectly Solved" challenges

Meta Fighter X is a mesmerizing journey through the vast space where the player will fly through challenging and wonderful 3D space environments. Encounter a massive amount of enemies as you reach the ultimate goal of collecting Space Capsules. You need to survive a barrage of attacks from Defense Towers, mines, fuel tanks and other obstacles as you fly past them while destroying them using advance missile technology. Pick between three battle ready spaceships equipped with various specs. Choose between blistering speed or a slow and steady approach. Metal Fighter X lets the player experience driving spaceships with friendly user controls. Use accelerometer control and device vibrate effects to make your driving simulation more realistic and enjoyable. (Keep in mind that you can turn this on and off as you wish)

필수어플 - 배터리스토커(배터리정보 표시) 배터리스토커(BatteryStalker) '배터리스토커'는 강력하고 가벼운 배터리 관리 프로그램입니다. 배터리스토커는 간단한 사용방법을 통해, 배터리의 정보를 알기 쉽게 표시합니다. 누구나 배터리스토커를 사용해 알림(Notification)을 통해 배터리 정보를 확인 할 수 있습니다. 배터리스토커의 가장 큰 장점은 메모리를 차지하지 않는다는 것입니다. 알람매니저를 사용해 배터리정보를 갱신하고 바로 종료됨으로써 메모리를 효율적으로 사용합니다. 또한 배터리 소비에 대한 부분을 해소함으로써 다른 배터리 어플과의 차별성을 강조합니다. 특이사항 - 베가 시리즈에서 배터리 온도가 제대로 표시되지 않을 수 있습니다. - 갤럭시S 시리즈에서 메모리정리(램정리)시 강제 종료될 수 있습니다. 이 경우를 대처하기 위해선 여러가지 작업이 필요하고, 처리를 한다면 굉장히 무거운 어플이 될 수 있기에 처리하지 않습니다. - 일부 스마트폰에서 배터리사용량 확인이 안될 수 있습니다. 1. 배터리 잔량(Battery level) - 배터리스토커는 배터리의 잔량을 아이콘과 함께 알림에 표시합니다. - 배터리스토커는 배터리의 잔량에 따라 다른색의 배터리 이미지를 보여줍니다. 2. 배터리 상태(Battery status) 배터리 상태는 아래와 같이 표시됩니다. - 알수없는(BATTERY_STATUS_UNKNOWN) - 충전중인(BATTERY_STATUS_CHARGING) - 방전중인(BATTERY_STATUS_DISCHARGING) - 충전정지(BATTERY_STATUS_NOT_CHARGING) - 완전 충전(BATTERY_STATUS_FULL) 3. 배터리 헬스(Battery health : 배터리 건강 상태) 배터리 헬스는 아래와 같이 표시됩니다. - 알수없음(BATTERY_HEALTH_UNKNOWN) - 알수없음(BATTERY_HEALTH_UNSPECIFIED_FAILURE) - 상태좋음(BATTERY_HEALTH_GOOD) - 과열상태(BATTERY_HEALTH_OVERHEAT) - 배터리불량(BATTERY_HEALTH_DEAD) - 과전압상태(BATTERY_HEALTH_OVER_VOLTAGE) 4. 배터리 잔량 - 배터리 잔량은 0~100까지 각 상태에 맞는 색의 배터리와 함께 알림(Status bar : 상태바)에 표시됩니다. 5. 배터리의 상태가 변경된 시간 - 충전, 방전등 배터리의 상태가 변할때, 상태가 변한 시간을 보여줍니다. ＃배터리스토커 사용방법＃ 1. 배터리스토커 어플리케이션을 실행합니다. 2. [배터리 알림 사용하기] 버튼을 누르면 배터리 표시가 유지됩니다. 3. [배터리 알림 종료하기] 버튼을 누르면 배터리스토커 사용이 종료됩니다. 4. [배터리 알림주기 설정하기] 버튼을 누르면, 배터리의 정보를 새로고침하는 시간을 설정할 수 있습니다. - 30초, 1분, 3분, 5분, 10분 5. 오류신고 및 문의메일은 [배터리스토커 개발자정보]를 통해서 보낼 수 있습니다. - 관련 검색어 - 어플스토커, 배터리스토커, croute battery, notification, 상태바 어플 - 2011.03.12 - V1.0.0 등록 - 2011.03.22 - v1.0.1 갤럭시S 등의 폰에서 충전중이라고 뜨던 상태 수정 - 2011.03.23 - v1.1.0 알림 아이콘 수정 : 좀 더 큰 숫자 사용 오류신고 메일 : 디바이스정보와 어플리케이션 버전 추가 알림 클릭 : 알림 클릭시 어플리케이션 실행 - 2011.05.24 - v.1.2.0 갤럭시S, 갤럭시S2 에서 램관리시 꺼지는 부분 수정 배터리 사용량 확인하기 메뉴 추가 USB, 데이터케이블을 사용하지 않고 배터리만 변경했을 때, 상태변경시간이 갱신되지 않는 부분 수정 - 2011.06.08 - v.1.2.5 배터리 정보 데이터 새로고침 호출 로직 수정 - 가끔 상태바에서 아이콘 사라지는 문제 수정 - 2011.06.12 - v.1.2.6 : Downgrade 확인되지 않은 오류로 인해 다운그레이드합니다. - 2011.06.17 - v.1.2.7 : Update 새로고침 오류 수정 버전입니다. - 2011.09.14 - v.1.3.1 : Update UI 디자인 변경 21~23% 아이콘 사라지는 버그 수정 - 2011.09.30 - v.1.3.2 : fix version 갤럭시S 및 갤럭시S2 애플리케이션 작동 멈춤 버그 픽스. - 2012.03.27 - v.1.4.0 : Update 갤럭시S2 기반의 ICS(아이스크림 샌드위치) 테스트 완료 Essential Apps - Battery Stalker (Battery information display) Battery Stalker (BatteryStalker) 'Battery Stalker' is a powerful, lightweight, battery-management program. Through the simple use of a stalker battery, the battery display information clearly. Anyone using a battery stalker alert (Notification) and you can check the battery information. The main advantage of battery stalker is that it does not take up memory. Using Alarm Manager to update the information immediately shut down the battery so that the efficient use of memory. In addition, the section on battery consumption by eliminating the other battery applications and emphasizes the distinction. Uniqueness - The temperature of the battery in the Vega series can not display correctly. - Clean up the Galaxy S series of memory (RAM cleanup) when forcing shutdown. In this case you need to deal with the various work instantly, and the process would be very heavy itgie application does not handle this. - Some smart phones may be disabled, check the battery usage. 1 remaining battery (Battery level) - Battery stalker with the power of the battery icon displayed in the notification. - Depending on the battery level, the battery stalker is battery shows images of different colors. 2 Battery Status (Battery status) The battery status is displayed as shown below. - Unknown (BATTERY_STATUS_UNKNOWN) - Charging (BATTERY_STATUS_CHARGING) - Is being discharged (BATTERY_STATUS_DISCHARGING) - Charge Stop (BATTERY_STATUS_NOT_CHARGING) - Fully charge (BATTERY_STATUS_FULL) 3 Battery health (Battery health: health of the battery) Battery health is displayed as shown below. - Unknown (BATTERY_HEALTH_UNKNOWN) - Unknown (BATTERY_HEALTH_UNSPECIFIED_FAILURE) - Fine (BATTERY_HEALTH_GOOD) - An over-temperature condition (BATTERY_HEALTH_OVERHEAT) - Battery failure (BATTERY_HEALTH_DEAD) - Overvoltage condition (BATTERY_HEALTH_OVER_VOLTAGE) 4 remaining battery - Battery level is from 0 to 100 for each color of the battery with the correct status notification (Status bar: The status bar) to be displayed. 3.5. Battery's state was changed - Charge, discharge lamp batteries are byeonhalttae, shows the time has changed state. How to use battery # stalker # 1 Run the battery stalker application. 2 - Using the Battery Notification] button to display the battery will be maintained. 3 - Battery Notification quit] button to end the use of battery stalker. 4 - Battery notification period setting] button is pressed, to refresh the battery, you can set the time.   - 30 seconds, 1 minute, 3 minutes, 5 minutes, 10 minutes 5 Error reporting and inquiry email to [battery Stalker developer Information can be sent through. - Related searches - Applications stalker, stalker battery, croute battery, notification, status bar application - 03/12/2011 - Registration V1.0.0 - 22/03/2011 - v1.0.1 Jungyirago phones such as the Galaxy S tteudeon state charge modification - 23/03/2011 - v1.1.0 Notification icons EDIT: Using a larger number of Report an error Mail: add device information and application versions Click the notification: Notification when application is running, click - 24/05/2011 - v.1.2.0 Galaxy S, Galaxy S2 off part of managing the RAM modified Check the battery usage menu additions USB, without using a data cable, but when changing the battery, the state does not change the time to update (edit) - 06/08/2011 - v.1.2.5 Modify data refresh battery information call logic - Fixed occasional disappearing icons in the status bar - 06/12/2011 - v.1.2.6: Downgrade Unchecked downgrade due to an error. - 17/06/2011 - v.1.2.7: Update Modified version of refresh failure. - 14/09/2011 - v.1.3.1: Update UI design changes 21-23% icons disappearing bug fixes - 30/09/2011 - v.1.3.2: fix version Galaxy S and Galaxy S2 applications stop working bug fixes. - 27/03/2012 - v.1.4.0: Update Based on the Galaxy S2 ICS (Ice Cream Sandwich) tested

description: PixWords™ - the new wonderfully interesting word puzzle challenge. 22 languages: English, Spanish, German, French, Dutch, Italian, Russian, Korean, Portuguese, Swedish, Danish, Norwegian, Finnish, Turkish, Polish, Greek, Czech, Lithuanian, Latvian, Estonian, Hungarian and Romanian Each word is a crossword puzzle hidden in a picture. Can you solve all the words? Upon solving one word, you open another letter, gradually unraveling the entire puzzle. Features: ✔ Free game ✔ Simple rules ✔ More than 800 levels ✔ Hundreds of words and pictures ✔ Choice of 22 languages: English, Russian, Spanish, German, French, etc. ✔ Terrific way to improve your vocabulary!

TaxiYoo Hotel è l’applicazione per gestire le chiamate e le prenotazioni di autopubbliche da hotel, ristoranti ed aziende di tutta Italia, che include tutte le funzionalità per permettere ai viaggiatori di prenotare le corse nel pieno rispetto delle normative nazionali, regionali e comunali vigenti. Grazie a TaxiYoo il passeggero potrà disporre di un nuovo strumento per prenotare una corsa, in modo immediato e intuitivo. Le principali caratteristiche di TaxiYoo sono: - Verifica dell’identità del tassista e del numero licenza per una maggiore tutela del passeggero - Geolocalizzazione per chiamare anche quando non si conosce l'indirizzo esatto in cui ci si trova - Nessun costo addizionale per il passeggero - Prenotazione corse per orari e giorni futuri Per un corretto uso dell'app: 1. usare GPS solo se all’esterno; in posti chiusi inserire indirizzo 2. il telefono deve essere inserito completo di prefisso nazionale o internazionale Attenzione: l'uso continuo del GPS richiesto dall'applicazione può diminuire la durata della batteria. L'applicazione progettata per l'utilizzo su tablet. TaxiYoo Hotel is the application to manage calls and bookings autopubbliche from hotels, restaurants and companies from all over Italy, which includes all the functionality to allow travelers to book rides in full compliance with national, regional and municipal regulations. Thank TaxiYoo the passenger may have a new tool to book a ride, so immediate and intuitive. The main features of TaxiYoo are: - Verification of the identity of the driver and the license number for greater protection of the passenger - Geolocation to call even when you do not know the exact address where there is - No additional cost to the passenger - Reservations ran for hours and days to come For a correct use of the app: 1. Use GPS only when the outside; in closed places insert address 2., The phone must be added to complete national or international prefix Warning: The use of the GPS application requires can shorten the life of the battery. The application is designed for use on tablets.

This software designed specially for peer-to-peer (P2P) network camera, through access to the IOTC (Internet Of Things Cloud) platform to realize P2P remote access. "Can't we all just... dance?!" Dance Man Obama can do 34 moves from 5 dance styles! ------------------------------------------------ Hip Hop Swing Silly Samba Belly ------------------------------------------------ He is the most famous Commander in Chief! app_name: Bus Guru Live London Bus Times
description: ☆☆☆ Bus Guru is the ONLY app to put ALL TFL's Live Countdown Data PLUS Journey Planner at the fingertips of London Bus Commuters – providing Londoners with ALL the REAL-TIME information they need ☆☆☆ ☆☆☆ By Popular Request, the Bus Guru Journey Planner lists all the user’s real-time bus options, journey times AND the buses' Live departure times, which allows Londoners to choose the soonest AND fastest bus ☆☆☆ The Next Web UK & Media Editor Paul Sawers says: 'Bus Guru is differentiating itself from existing apps by providing real-time information... as well as letting you plan your journey... You can choose to view bus stops and full TFL bus routes on a customised map, and you can even see all the locations where you can top-up your Oyster Card around you, which is actually a very handy feature if you’re looking to avoid paying the premium cash-fares on London transport... It’s an intuitive app to use. Most importantly, it works and it’s pretty fast too.' New Media Age's Ronan Shields says: 'I’ve spent many a frosty morning stuck at an East End bus stop cursing the lack of such a service and the Bus Guru site developers here have finally delivered.' FEATURES Never miss a bus again! Bus Guru puts ALL of the information London bus commuters need at their fingertips. It is lightening fast due to its advanced caching technology, easy to use and doesn’t crash. It has the 18,942 London bus stops and 1,340 routes covered and also provides: ⚑ LIVE INFO: Up-to-the-second information on all TFL buses’ real-time locations. ⚑ ONE CLICK: To view your nearest stop’s buses OR all the bus stops around you. ⚑ LIVE JOURNEY PLANNER: Compare the quickest routes AND live bus times using Bus Guru’s Journey Planner integrated with live bus times. So you can find the fastest bus AND which bus is leaving first. ⚑ SEARCH: For ANY bus stop and live bus info via an address/postcode/area. ⚑ MAPS: View bus stops and full TFL bus routes on a customised map. Tap on a flag to view the bus stop number and name, plus the final destination and routes. ⚑ OYSTER CARD TOP-UPS: View ALL of the Oyster Card Top-up vendors around you. Search for Oyster vendors via the map. ⚑ FAVOURITES: Save bus stops by tapping the star. ⚑ RECENT STOPS: Look at the stops you’ve recently viewed with one click. ⚑ DISRUPTIONS: View live bus diversions, cancellations and closures. ⚑ INTUITIVE USER INTERFACE: We have invested a considerable amount of time into making Bus Guru user-friendly, nifty and beautiful. ⚑ FAST: Due to advanced caching technology and optimisation. ⚑ STABLE: Works on all types of Android phone – and doesn’t crash. ⚑ MORE FEATURES COMING SOON: Please email us support@busguru.co.uk / Tweet @BusGuru / write on the www.facebook.com/BusGuru wall to let us know what features you’d like. JOURNEY PLANNER We have combined two very complex systems so please email the Bus Guru Support Team support@busguru.co.uk if you find any blips and we will update the app. LOCATION SERVICES As with all good location-based apps, Bus Guru works with your phone’s location services (3G/GPS/GPRS/WiFi) and searches for up to 10 seconds to locate you as accurately as possible when you open the app so please make sure your setting for location services are on. TFL LIVE COUNTDOWN DATA If the app ever says ‘No Data Available’ it is either due to TFL’s data being temporarily unavailable or your location is outside the TFL Live Countdown zone. HELP If you do experience any problems then please do contact the Bus Guru Support Team support@busguru.co.uk (before rashly leaving a bad review) as we can most likely swiftly solve it for you. Feedback is always read and considered. SHARE Keep Bus Guru free by telling your friends: Twitter @BusGuru / Facebook: facebook.com/BusGuru. Bus Guru www.busguru.co.uk is available for all smartphones. Data provided by Transport For London.
release_text: Searching issue fixed in the app, search funcationaliy is working now.

description: Diamond Digger Saga, from the makers of Candy Crush Saga & Farm Heroes Saga! Can you dig it? Join Diggy as you dig through diamonds and unearth special treasures. Epic adventures await you in the lands of Diamond Dale, Turquoise Meringue and beyond. Diggy finds a treasure map, sparking his underground search for gems! Lead Diggy through a world full of diamonds in this wonderful digging adventure! Dig a path by clearing away a group of 3 or more diamonds to reach a target score. Use the water to make your way through the rooms and discover treasures! Unearth gems and rescue fireflies in this beautiful game of wonder and delight. Take on this delightful Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!  Diamond Digger Saga is completely free to play, but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment. By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms Diamond Digger Saga features: ● Bright and colorful graphics ● Friendly and fascinating characters living in a fantasy world ● Color bursts, line blasts and dynamite to lend a helping hand ● Unlock boosters and special treasures hidden beneath the ground tiles! ● Easy and fun to play, challenging to master  ● Over 700 levels to complete filled with wondrous delights! ● Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors! ● Easily sync the game between devices and unlock full game features when connected to the internet Already a fan of Diamond Digger Saga? Like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for the latest news: facebook.com/diamonddiggersaga twitter.com/diamond_digger Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Diamond Digger Saga!

Together, they’ll unmask these 20 LEVELS on December 30th - a total of 810 levels for you to enjoy! Note: “I wish I had a beak to peck at stuff!” – Diggy.

description: Are you a super fan of jewels-matching games? If the answer is yes, Jewels Dash is the game that you must have. Unlike the classic jewels-matching game such as Bejeweled, it has a lot of new features (just like diamond dash on iOS) to make the game much more interesting and challenging. ☆☆☆☆☆ How to play ☆☆☆☆☆ - Simply tap your finger on any matching jewels to match as many colorful diamonds as possible before the time runs out; - Try to make the match as quick as possible, then you can enjoy the best feeling of continuous Combo and awarding scores. ☆☆☆☆☆ Highlighted Features ☆☆☆☆☆ - Three game modes, each has its own attractive point, to keep the players' feeling of freshness; - New power ups, to make the game more exciting and interesting; - Bright and vibrant graphics & effects; - It is a game that is accessible for people of all ages. There is no limit to the amount of fun that can be had in Jewels-Dash! We believe that everyone is a gamer at heart and that games are a great source of joy and relaxation. So Ezjoy always try to make the games easy and joy. For Jewels Dash, we want to make it the best one-tap matching style game on Android and your 5-star reviews keep us inspired and motivated. Visit m.ezjoygame.com from your Android device to see the whole gamelist. Enormous thanks to everyone for their playing, feedback, and support. ========================== Ezjoy is the name behind Marble Blast, Jewels Maze, Empire VS Orcs, Bird Blast, Bubble Pop, Devil Hunter, Ice Breaker, Jewels Miner and many other top popular games. ==========================

description: Old Russian and Latvian casual game with checkers board and pieces. Your goal is to kick the other guy's pieces from the board punching your pieces. That experience is recreated in this game. Touch the piece that you want to throw on other player, and swipe in the target direction. When all their pieces are off the board, you advance one row on the checkerboard. Ultimate goal is to reach other side of board faster than your opponent. Good luck on a battlefield! Game controls are very simple: - Reset: restarts game from 0:0. Starts new game. If pressed repeatedly, goes through finished levels - Opponent: Android / Human / Multiplayer. - HiScore: show page - Sound: ON/OFF - Hardness: Hard/Medium/Easy

description: Slide your fingers on the screen to move the rows and columns of Tiki stones and gems. Match 3 or more stones, use rainbow blocks to help you out, and use bonus blocks to get crazy good scores! Watch out for the frost blocks and the exploding totem blocks trying to stop you from reaching your new high score! Start with the Classic mode and work your way to unlocking the frantic Timed mode. Once you've mastered those you can move on the the crazy Hard mode and the enlightening Zen mode.

description: Easily turn any text messaging conversation into a transcript and share it through email, Facebook, or other applications. Options include the ability to limit the message range to a specific period. The intuitive interface allows you to easily see the number of messages in a conversation and select it for export. Limited permissions required for your protection. Text Message Transcript only requires the ability to Read SMS messages and Lookup Contacts (to get proper contact names). Please note that the time displayed are the times as recorded by the Service Provider's time stamp, which in most cases should be your local time, but some providers have chosen to store time in GMT or other standard. LEGAL DISCLAIMER: We make not claim as the suitability of this application for any purpose or use. It is not certified for use in legal discovery or for any related purpose.
release_text: Fixed Force Close issue related to running out of memory on some devices. Tested against 1,000,000 text messages without significant memory growth now.

description: Want to share a file with a friend or a co-worker? Just tap their name, tap the file, and they have it! Any Send makes sharing files over wifi as easy and fast as it possibly can be. Just install Any Send on two Android phones, and you can send anything between them, at superfast wifi speeds. You can also send to Windows and Macs, get the free apps from http://getanysend.com/ Features: * Incredibly simple sharing. Just select the file, the person, and that's it! * Very fast sharing speeds powered by your local network, no internet required. * Background service sharing ability * Support for tons of file types: movies, audio, images, contacts, any file. * Custom designs for both landscape and portrait modes * Doesn't use your internet bandwidth, completely local WiFi sharing. ALSO ON * PC and Mac! http://getanysend.com/ COMING SOON: Android is first to get Any Send, an iOS version is coming soon! ## FEEDBACK Any Send is a new app and currently in beta, we are working hard to make it more awesome. Please send feedback to web-support@adylitica.com thanks for all your feedback and reports!

description: Moviefone is the ultimate app for movie times, movie theater listings, trailers, and reviews. Our convenient, streamlined design helps you discover movies that are currently playing and coming soon. Quickly find which theater your movie is playing in and get showtimes. MORE AWESOME FEATURES: • Find movies playing near you with one tap! • View movies in theaters, movies coming soon and top box office hits. • Check out trailers for the latest movies. • Get movie times, tickets, and theater details. • Save your favorite theaters for quick and easy access to movie times. • Search for movies by title or zip code. • Share movie details and times via Facebook, text, or by email. We hope you love the app as much as we do. As always we appreciate all your feedback so please send comments to support@moviefone.com .

With the power of Painter Mobile 2.0, you can paint whenever and wherever inspiration strikes. Explore the updated interface for Material Design to get started, and streamline your workflow in one of three ways: photo paint, trace or start from scratch. Apply an array of layer blend modes, such as Multiply, Screen, Overlay, Soft Light or Darken, to achieve the exact look you want. Find the perfect painting tool within each brush pack, designed and organized for all types of artists to seamlessly blend and mix. Output your paintings as traditional art, print them for a gallery, transform photos into paintings with the new photo paint mode, or even share using Samsung’s PEN.UP service. Get a faster way to paint on the go with Painter Mobile 2.0. • Access familiar tools, including: Paint, Blend, Eyedropper, Paint Bucket, Eraser and Crop • Streamlined workflows: Photo paint, Trace, or start from scratch • Take advantage of Horizontal, Vertical and Kaleidoscope symmetry • Work with up to 15* layers • Import photos from a gallery, camera or Google Images search • Save as JPEG and send documents to Corel Painter on the desktop (Upgrade to Full and also save to PNG or export all your layers as individual images) • Work quickly using two finger canvas rotation • Map functions to hardware keys or common gestures (long press and double-tap) • Use your finger to blend, navigate the canvas or select a color while you paint with your stylus • Use brush sets designed for artists • Blend and mix colors naturally with any brush • Experience life-like painting with pressure-sensitivity and stylus support • Work with a non-obtrusive interface for optimal drawing space • Optimized for the Wacom Cintiq Companion Hybrid and other stylus devices *Not available on some devices Thanks to Ivan McKinnon, Terri Cooper, Manuel Mendoza Reyes, Jeffrey Hebert, Emmanel Charon, Sathish B.R., Regina W, massimo, and Tiriasu for permitting us to use their amazing artwork.

description: Check the GamePlay video at: www.facebook.com/meanybirds *** Warning: Extremely Challenging *** Hungry MeanyBirds are circling the skies above, eyeing the poor little CutieFish. Hopeless on his own, CutieFish needs your help… Grab your bow, take aim, and fire! Shoot down the Meany Birds before they have a chance to grab CutieFish! Every second that passes is a second lost to hungry Meany Birds. Only those with precise aim, timing, logic, sheer goodwill, and unwavering perseverance will succeed in saving the CutieFish… ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Featuring hours of addicting gameplay, challenging you more and more as you pass each level, MeanyBirds forces sharp shooting and strategic thinking – introducing new obstacles and obstructions along your quest for fish-saving fame. --- Download Meany Birds to find out if you’ve got what it takes to achieve 3-star shooting status! ----- Follow us at: https://www.facebook.com/meanybirds https://twitter.com/meanybirds https://plus.google.com/app/basic/107041804352853097662 http://www.youtube.com/user/MeanyTube/videos ----- Tags: Meany Birds, MeanyBirds, Mean birds, Mean Bird, Meen Bird, Meen Birds, Maen Bird, Maen Birds, Maen, Meen, Birds, Mean, Meany, Hungry, Angry, Cute Fish, Cutie Fish, Fish, hunter, hunting, shoot, Shooting, Shooter, arrow, Arrows, Bow, Save, Saving, Archery, Meany Birds, MeanyBirds, Mean birds, Birds, Mean, Meany, Hungry, Angry,flappy,clumsy,Splashy,Cute Fish, Cutie Fish, Fish, Shooting, Shooter, Arrows, Bow, Save, Saving, Archery, meen, maen, cute, cutie, fishie, arrow, bird, ugly, killer

description: We're celebrating the New Year with a 50% OFF SALE Start the year well by taking advantage of this huge discount of the full version of Feed Baby. For January only! Feed Baby Pro UNLOCKS ALL FEATURES of Feed Baby Lite. When you install Feed Baby Pro you can continue to use Feed Baby Lite as normal so that none of your data is lost. Also, Sync will be available to be used in Lite so that you can start Syncing between devices running Feed Baby! ★ Number 1 Paid Medical mobile app in over 20 countries worldwide, including US, UK, Canada, Australia and India ★ ★ Featured on the Google Play home page under "Apps for New Parents" and "Welbeing Apps" ★ Feed Baby is also available for the iPhone on the Apple app store. Just search for "Feed Baby Tracker" in iTunes. Each device that syncs will need to have Feed Baby Pro purchased and installed. Feed Baby Pro only needs to be purchased ONCE PER GOOGLE ACCOUNT. Once you purchase Feed Baby Pro then you can install/re-install it on all of your devices as long as those devices all use the same Google Play account (this is the same way that all paid apps work in the Google Play store). Track and Monitor ALL aspects of your babys breastfeeding, growth and development. Record Bottle and Breast feedings, Daipers, Sleep, Pumpings, Growth Charts and Journals. - Easily record breast/bottle/SOLID feeds with a single touch. - Easily record daiper changes (pees/poos) with a single touch. - Device-to-Device Synchronization between any number of devices - Easily record and chart your babys Growths (weight, height and head circumference) - Easily record your Babys Sleeping Sessions with a single touch - Easily record your Pumping Sessions - Easily "Continue" the last recorded feed (not available in "Lite") - Easily "Pause" the current feed (not available in "Lite") - Easily add Medicines and create Medication Records to record all of your babys medicine intake - Easily record Baths, Diary entries, Activities, etc.... - Record 2 Babies (only available when Feed Baby Pro is installed) - Supports Twins! - Daily Summary screen that shows ALL activities for each day - Timelines shows you all of your activities across multiple days so that you can have a better understanding of your babys activity patterns - WIDGETS to help you access key features from the home screen - You can now use your Android Wear smartwatch to perform various actions in Feed Baby with just a touch of your wrist. You will also be able to use your Android Wear smartwatch see quick updates of your babys latest Feeds, Diaper changes, Sleeps and Pumpings. - Feed Baby automatically saves and restores your data in case the database gets corrupted - Easily add notes for Feeds, Diapers and Sleeps - Charts and graphs give you a clear visualization of feeding patterns (not available in "Lite") - Customizable Theme/Skins! Choose your preferred color scheme for Feed Baby from one of "Dark Knight", "Baby Blue" or "Vintage Pink". And more Themes are coming! (not available in "Lite") - Export your entire Feeding History as a CSV file and automatically send it to any email address. You can then print it out for further analysis by yourself or your doctor (not available in "Lite"). - Full screen clock is displayed during feeds so you can check at a glance the amount of time that has elapsed during a feed - All history is kept and fully browsable - Individual feeds are grouped automatically into "Feeding Sessions" for better visualization - Fully customizable notifications means that you never miss a feed or have a feed go for too long (not available in "Lite") - Each feed is fully editable so that you can retrospectively alter the start/end times and bottle quantities - Supports both oz and ml for bottle quantities. Simply specify your preference in the Settings - Fully supported with regular updates. 'Feed Baby' is a fully supported product. And we provide email support for any questions you have or issues you may encounter.

description: Virgin Media WiFi Buddy is a free app exclusively for Virgin Media Mobile customers. Just download it on your mobile and it’ll automatically connect to fast reliable WiFi hotspots when you’re out and about. Effortlessly connect to the internet - no logins, no passwords; it automatically connects to WiFi hotspots for you. So you’ll always enjoy fast unlimited web access, plus you can check your data allowance to make sure you don’t exceed your limit. You may be away from your home broadband but you can still watch uninterrupted sport, TV shows and movies on the move. Or if you’re a gamer, turn anywhere into your playground - just surf the web with a more reliable coverage connection for unlimited fun and games. And if music is your thing, you’ll get into the beat faster than on 3G. The Virgin Media WiFi Buddy app offers reliable unlimited coverage to the internet so you can make sure you never miss out on a free hotspot or exceed your personal data allowance.Get to enjoy the content you love without worrying–whether it’s streaming your favourite shows or listening to tracks online, it makes sense to use public WiFi or your home connection rather than wasting your phone data allowance. Just check our handy hotspot locator to find out your nearest locations when you’re out and about. Virgin Media WiFi Buddy easily auto-connects Virgin Media Mobile customers to over 150,000 WiFi hotspots including freeinternet access to 22,000 hotspot locations from The Cloud in popular places like cafes, bars, restaurants, gyms and shops. No more sign ups, no more logging in – just the fast reliable unlimited WiFi broadband coverage you need, letting you surf the internet when you want, where you want. The Cloud WiFi hotspots include popular places across the UK such as M&S, WH Smith, Pizza Express, Wagamama, Caffé Nero, Pret A Manger, Superdrug, Wetherspoons, Yates’s, Greggs, Alton Towers, Thorpe Park plus selected shopping centres and train stations. What users are already saying about WiFi Buddy: ‘Autoconnects in places where signal can struggle’ ‘Free access to WiFi hotspots? I’ll have some of that!’ ‘Helps me keep an eye on my data’ Key Features: • It’s free and easy: get the app and whatever your location, whenever you enter a hotspot, you’ll automatically get connected to speedy WiFi • Surf the web with a more reliable connection • Use the app to avoid going over your data allowance • It’s free – you can even see how much data you’ve used over WiFi and 3G, and keep track of how much WiFi Buddy has saved you • Easily connect to your home broadband network with our Quick Connect feature *Auto-Connect* • WiFi Buddy works effortlessly and quietly in the background • It’s free, simple and easily set up: get the app and whenever you enter an internet hotspot, you’ll automatically get connected to fast WiFi web coverage Whatever your location, your device will automatically connect whenever in range of thousands of WiFi hotspots, so no annoying sign-ups or ads and no need to re-enter username and password every time- allowing you to surf the web with ease. Find out more: https://youtu.be/5b2TVw6Jllc Access our website: http://store.virginmedia.com/discover/broadband/broadbandextras/wifi-buddy.html For help: http://help.virginmedia.com/system/selfservice.controller
release_text: - Improved graphics, now even easier to track your data and save money - New tutorial for first time users - Further battery optimisations and bug fixes

description: Because there's no room for error, turn to McGraw-Hill's I.V. Drug Handbook. Featuring a strong focus on patient safety, administering and monitoring I.V. drugs, the Handbook delivers concise, practical guidance to help you carry out one of the most difficult tasks you face. Written by and for practicing nurses and pharmacists, the Handbook is reliable, comprehensive, and easy-to-use. *** Fully Functional 7-Day Trial **** Everything you need for safe, successful I.V. drug administration: * All-inclusive coverage of over 350 parenteral drugs with the latest warnings from the FDA * Includes antibiotics, insulin, pain medications, emergency drugs -- and more coverage of chemotherapeutic agents with more supportive therapies than you'll find in any other text * Provides the most comprehensive, specific, evidence-based guidelines on administering high-alert and hazardous drugs available anywhere * Each drug monograph includes administration guidelines, covering preparation, dilution & compatibility, infusion rates, admixtures, supportive therapies and monitoring. * Features a 32 page full-color patient safety insert describing measures for ensuring safe drug administration, including 6 pages on inserting an I.V. catheter * Uses distinctive icons to call your attention to "clinical alerts," "life-threatening reactions," "high-alert", "hazardous" drugs, and more Biographical note: Patricia Dwyer Schull, MSN, RN, has been in medical publishing for more than twenty years. Prior to establishing MedVantage Publishing, Patricia held executive management positions with the top medical publishers in the world. She has edited and authored many popular nursing publications including several drug titles. Before entering the publishing business, Patricia spent 16 years in various aspects of nursing management, direct patient care and staff education as a professional registered nurse. A search tool Featuring various search options to help you find the words you need more easily, including: * A quick search of words while you type * A 'fuzzy filter' for when you are not sure of the correct spelling of a word * A 'keyword' search for finding key words within phrasal verbs * A wild card search facility which can replace a letter or a group of letters A learning tool The dictionary app includes a number of features which help you to expand your vocabulary further: * A 'Favourites' feature allows you to create your own categories and lists of words * Your last visited words are all saved in your 'History', so that you can quickly look back at recently checked words * Discover a new word every day with the 'Daily' feature * Ability to have dictionary Word of the Day as a widget on the device home screen * See words in context with example sentences * Online and offline modes supported, the offline mode allows you to download the whole dictionary and work independently from data connections

description: Natural Notes is a free digital note book for Android smartphones or tablets. With Natural Notes you can write, store and share your notes. It is a useful application, natural to use and totally free! You can add, edit, delete and share the notes you add. In addition to using this application as a digital note pad, you can use it to compose and save messages that you can then send by email, SMS and with other applications installed on your device. Just write a note and use the "share" feature. You can even write your tweets to Twitter or Facebook messages ... write down everything you need, Natural Notes stores it for when you want to check your notes or send them. Includes backup feature to the MicroSD memory card of your device. Nature Notes is a free application and without ads. Does not connect to the Internet. Added option to open any .txt file on the device with Natural Notes and save it as a note (.txt files you receive via Bluetooth, as an email attach, etc). Added option to install or move the app to the SD card (on Android versions that allow this) New design for large 10 inch HoneyComb tablets Improved portuguese translation. Thank you Bernardo! Improved french translation. Thank you Philippe! Improved style for large non-Honeycomb tablets. Improved translation into Italian and Portuguese. Version 2.9 NEW If there is no title for the note it will set automatically. NEW Improved design on Android Ice Cream and Jelly Bean versions. NEW Added more options to the new Settings screen. NEW Double tap note text to open edit mode. NEW Added option to insert date and time to text or title name on double tap. NEW More control over your backups: you can now choose the folder on your device in the settings screen. NEW Various bug fixes. Your comments and suggestions are welcome at info@naturalapps.com email (we can not reply to comments).
release_text: If there is no title for the note it will set automatically. Improved design on Android Ice Cream and Jelly Bean versions. Added more options to the new Settings screen. More control over your backups: you can now choose the folder on your device in the settings screen. Various bug fixes.

description: You've never played solitaire like this before! We've combined two of the greatest things in the world, Reddit + Solitaire :) The result is the ultimate time waster. The concept is simple, play standard Klondike Solitaire, but on the front of each card is a random image downloaded from Reddit. Tap a card and jump into full screen view. When you're done laughing your butt off (or not), jump back into solitaire and continue your game. Awesome? Yes. This works both sides of your brain at the same time, it's totally addicting. You can choose from a variety of Reddit feeds, including "nsfw", "funny", "sports", "art", "comics" and many more. Features include: * Either 1 or 3 card drops * Vegas Mode * Highscores * Choose from a variety of Reddit Feeds * Zoom / Pan Fullscreen Reddits * View comments * Share via Email

Pill Reminder is an application that helps you to remember to take your pills. Set the pill cycle, the stop days and time of notification. It will do the rest! Thanks to Nicolas Ciotti for the UI design ( http://www.nicolasciotti.com ) Thanks to TuttoAndroid.net for the review ( http://www.tuttoandroid.net/applicazioni/app-nursery-pill-reminder-152028/ ) Thanks to Androidiani.com for the review ( http://www.androidiani.com/applicazioni/pill-reminder-da-uno-sviluppatore-italiano-unapp-che-ci-ricorda-di-prendere-le-nostre-medicine-193912 ) Translations: English, italian, german, french, spanish, dutch, polish, ukrainian and chinese Changelog: v.1.1.6 - bugfix on change locale v1.1.4 - 10" tablets compatibility - graphics bugfix v1.1.3 - minor bug fixes v1.1.2 - Added Google Analytics support v1.1.1 - Added Android4.4 KitKat compatibility - Added dutch localization - Added ukrainian localization v.1.1.0 - Added multi-pills support - Pills list on day selection - Redesigned notifications - Data stored on SQLite database - Bugfix related to the change of the locale v.1.0.9 - Added french localization v.1.0.8 - Added spanish localization v.1.0.7 - Added polish localization v.1.0.6 - Added german localization v.1.0.5 - Added chinese localization - Fixed "back" key on settings v.1.0.4 - Added cycle's end date v.1.0.3 - Improving gestures performances v.1.0.2 - Notification LED color customization - Today's text color modified, for the stop period v.1.0.1 - Added notification LED compatibility

Dallas Cowboys Star Magazine The largest team publication in the NFL, the OFFICIAL magazine of the Dallas Cowboys brings you 32 issues per year – weekly during the season (August-January) and monthly throughout the offseason (February-July). Delivered direct to your smart phone or tablet, you’ll get behind-the-scenes coverage of the Cowboys, including game analysis, opponent previews, in-depth player profiles, exciting photos and fun-filled facts about your favorite team. Special issues include the annual April draft preview, the training camp guide in July and the season preview in late August. And don’t forget our often imitated, never equaled Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders swimsuit issue in June! Published in exceptional quality, you can read Dallas Cowboys Star Magazine on a full screen single page or flip your device for a double-page spread. Tap the page selector to quickly navigate to a specific page. You can also download and save individual pages to enjoy whether you’re offline or on the go. Your Dallas Cowboys Star Magazine app features search functionality to find keywords relating to recent content. Use the zoom function to enable clearer reading of selected articles Integrated social networking allows you to keep your friends up to date with all the latest shared news from Dallas Cowboys Star Magazine. With Dallas Cowboys Star Magazine you can purchase 32 issues (a 1 year subscription) for $14.99. Payment for the subscription will be charged to your Google Play account upon purchase. No cancelations of the current subscription are allowed during the active subscription period.

developer: Daily Yoga Software Technology Co. Ltd
description: This is a PRO plugin of Daily Yoga and requires subscription fee to unlock. Please install the main app 'Daily Yoga' before using this plugin: Store link: http://goo.gl/yuDqJ Prenatal Yoga (PRO) contains three simple yoga classes aiming at different trimesters, which helps you in dealing with the symptoms of pregnancy, ensuring smoother and easier delivery, and faster recovery after childbirth. For the first trimester, standing yoga poses are advised as this will help strengthen the legs, enhance circulation, generate energy, and may reduce leg cramps. During the second and third trimester, you may reduce your time spent for practicing the asanas to prevent fatigue and overwork. Instead focus more on breathing and meditation. It is also not advised to practice from the tenth through the fourteenth week of pregnancy since these are crucial times. To sum up, the practice of yoga can help you prepare your mind and body for labor and birth as this helps you focus, to concentrate and keep you healthy. The yoga postures embedded in this class are gentle ways of keeping your body active and supple and minimize the common symptoms like morning sickness and constipation. It can also help in ensuring easier labor and smooth delivery by relieving tension around the cervix and birth canal and by opening the pelvis.

In Culture Wars, the player influences a population of realistic bacteria to complete objectives. The bacteria in the game behave very closely to bacteria in the real world. They use nutrients to survive, and they must find and collect more nutrients in order to replicate. They also mutate and pass on their mutations to their offspring. The player must influence the movements of the bacteria through chemoattractants, avoiding viruses and influencing the evolution of the bacterias' population to ensure its survival. Culture Wars lies in a gray area between gaming and education and takes advantage of games' unique capability of demonstrating complex, working systems with dozens of interlocking parts. While playing Bacterium, the player can witness and influence the evolutionary process and interact with the mechanisms of genetic drift and natural selection. It plays like a strategy game, but the player comes out of the experience with a much more intuitive understanding of how the evolutionary process fits together. Culture Wars was created by Stoz Studios, LLC and released through Butterscotch Shenanigans, LLC. Music by Kevin MacLeod at incompetech.com.
